1b1(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya s+ya ban+d+ha prab+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ha rA nA ma ma hA
1b2(rgyud): naswatra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa di sngo dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya
1b3(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang ngo / 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / daltar byung
1b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang phags pa nyan thosamasapa
1b5(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi
2a1(rgyud): dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing
2a2(rgyud): rnams med pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa
2a3(rgyud): dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs baning sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis
2a4(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpa med
2a5(rgyud): kyis nub phyogs su// y+Ya yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis
2a6(rgyud): las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ 
2b1(rgyud): thams cad mabyon pa nyid kyi ga no// dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyad pa// byin gyis brlabs de brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zar pa dang tshe nyams dang / 
2b2(rgyud): phun supa tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams brgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // kun gza' la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yinapa
2b3(rgyud): 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byad snye ma dang // mi bzad ga don gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan
2b4(rgyud): las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yi dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyi
2b5(rgyud): brgyan te// bab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde mnyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ 
2b6(rgyud): dag rtag tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po chags kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye 'du ma yis// de dag la ni bsrung bar byed// lha
2b7(rgyud): dbyangs can dang // nair ny+dzanar gnas pa dang // 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang
2b8(rgyud): po'am cida'ang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo me g.yel ba
3a1(rgyud): de dgal ni 'asra ba bye// khabamams cas chu gru pa// sas rgyam thun kyigs ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dag ga// mad 'di btub shAd pa
3a2(rgyud): gdu dag pado di nyan 'dang // gang ga gzhan las chos byed dang// skyengs sul dang // gang dgas chod pa byed parnams// de dag shu ga dang // mi dang mi'am ci dgad/ 
3a3(rgyud): dgradod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bya bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams med pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung zin// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang / 
3a4(rgyud): yin// gtsang ma'i gas rnams rab 'gas// drirnam pa le gos pa rin pa// byams pa'i sems na kyi gaganas// gsol ba med pa mchod 'a bya// rang gi
3b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po mangs pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge rtsab bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la
3b2(rgyud): byas bzhig gnas pa de 'disam du sems te/ rgya ga da rkye na gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shA grub pa 'di lta ste/ lo bakhyod cwa zhig thub s+ho/ 'di ltar sna tshe mang snyam nas/ de ya
3b3(rgyud): snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gapa zhi na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang // rabs
3b4(rgyud): rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya ub pas ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong grangs med pa mang po nas/ sreg gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba
3b5(rgyud): las kyo lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur/ zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ than dang gi lus kyi shad bathag dang rus pa dang rkang gis kyang se
3b6(rgyud): can lhogs pa rnams tsam par mdzad na/ bas gzhan gyis ltaci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag
3b7(rgyud): sems pan/ de'i khyim langs shing chel 'ad sngon po las grub pa/ lha dzin pa'i rnams smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'don bsku ba/ lha las 'das pa'i spyos kyis kya
3b8(rgyud): so// khyim de'i phyogs pa zhenas 'i rin pa che gris byung bar gyur te/ thaMde dag las kyang du bre lta sa ma du rin pa cha thugs rnams bte ba da/ ngas gyur to// thongs
4a1(rgyud): kyang lha'i me tog pad ma rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bskur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das bzhi nyung
4a2(rgyud): g+hu he/ gar rdzogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs / phyogs nas ni de bzhin sa grags pa na tom rdub phyogs nas ni de bzhin ga shegs pa da
4a3(rgyud): byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs par byung ste/ seng ge'i phred dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong kyi
4a4(rgyud): bo snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi sring chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kyi bar dag snang bas
4a5(rgyud): lha'i me tog dag gi char yang bab/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams
4a6(rgyud): cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dbus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / 
4a7(rgyud): sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yengs pa dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo dag
4a8(rgyud): ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom ngom par gyur// sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ 
4b1(rgyud): rdzas kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang bachang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngomachar rmad du blang ba'i chos rnams tu cher byung bar bya s+ho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mangs pa'i rtog gos sangs
4b2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de tshe mad/ du mgul yi drangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gal
4b3(rgyud): dalogs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu
4b4(rgyud): 'i tshad la zor mo ba par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa 'di ltar la brgyad du zhig zu skye sku tshe thung ba 'dring sa bu/ 'di ci zhig rgyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// 
4b5(rgyud): desangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das
4b6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa 'di ltar smre tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mo gtogs par/ 
4b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i 'dzi// tin dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i phyed du dang lha dang me dang lham yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
4b8(rgyud): kya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyi su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i glu 'i
5a1(rgyud): dpa sha pa pa dus suH/ dranas de mas ngas rgyas kyi rdus gA'i bu 'dod pa da spyo banam 'dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang ku dang rgan dang
5a2(rgyud): ma dar lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ na sa shAHthucha bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdong
5a3(rgyud): bka' stsal ba// rgya mamo chu rnams thams // thig pa dag ni 'grang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku me'i tshad// sras kyang 'phreng bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang / 
5a4(rgyud): phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// lus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// sa pheM gang dag yod pa yis// rab tu rga du la'i snyed pa// thams cad bgrang ba dus sring
5a5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa da ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgyad gces// grangs ni na par mi rung ngo // gad b+hI de'i rgyu dang ni// rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te/ 
5a6(rgyud): sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // 'gras mang pa byin pa ste// dbyi dag nyid chen po da'o//  ngas dem spyod do// bskal pa na kyi tshog// grangs med pa ni bzhin te/ 
5b1(rgyud): chom med par 'gyur// ma su dam pashig/ yul pa'i sku che bas yi// grangs na gang du mi dmigs so// zhen 'a che mthong de slob dpon lung ston pa bram tha ga tu zhes bya ba dang
5b2(rgyud): bras pa slong gragadums sem ldan rnams ma/ de di na gshegs pa yongasas kyang ngan pas 'das chen pa'i ba lan 'bral sa 'das te/ ma ldan 'das kyizhabs ga
5b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen pa dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams
5b4(rgyud): lal gas nyam pa dang mnyam pa gyus/ tha sa sre mas/ shes da me shi 'i na mam ga ba tu mags shes/ sa kyi 'a ldan ma smad
5b5(rgyud): rjen bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam bzhi gsal du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas gyi mthus 'khor de ma ci'i gzhon du 'jig rten thams
5b6(rgyud): kyis mthong na dkar ba zhes bya ba de slobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bras pa kad rgyal 'di skad ces smras so// ci bram ze chen babyed/ bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol la ma
5b7(rgyud): bdag gis kyin la das ni/  // sa sa smras pa/  nan napa ldan nga sa /  sa nga
5b8(rgyud): yungs 'bru tsam la bsten par 'dod do// ring 'asrel lung la 'bru tsam de mngon par mchod pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
6a1(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa'i mdonyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes pa nga/ rab/ khong dud pa dka' bde ga bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa gas
6a2(rgyud): dram pa'i mdon ces byanas / khyim pa ga gas pa da da/ da shesas pa ga nang rtogs pa sa sa/  ma pa gsu
6a3(rgyud): gang bcangs na sems can nams mya dngas su bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel lungs 'bru ma pas tog ginang du bdug la bcangs kyang rung ngo // kyemi byin/ 
6a4(rgyud): don du spyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsgyel yungs 'brutsam gsol nas/ rlung bskal gyi ba ma tog tu bcug ste bcings pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob
6a5(rgyud): dam 'dodadam/ rkye gnon dumapas nid ma pa de sa/ blags pa to// des mi thiganon nu dig na mas kyis mthong da dga' bas/ slob pon lung son sa thas nan
6a6(rgyud): rgyam tshigs su bcad bdag gis slar smras pa/ nam nig gang shA chu rkun la// me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmang por 'gyur ba dang // wa thug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang / 
6a7(rgyud): ljom kyi la //  gogs 'i dag pa g+sa/ na rgyas phru//  nigs sa pa na/  sa sa nubs pas// 
6a8(rgyud): sa / sa rlo // das tha pas med//  khris pa pa rgya//  ga sa kyi da lagalas// ya gi migs pa ha~M// na na
6b1(rgyud): lag byed//  mazhi na slo rnams kyis// gas 'igs pa rgyas gyu pa//  kyi khrim pa dpa mi u// slob ni nanas ni da 'gas// hrI zlab pa sa
6b2(rgyud): grong dargyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par
6b3(rgyud): nas nig bong bu bder gyur la// mchud mar bi ma pa 'drar gyur cing // klu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben
6b4(rgyud): rnam rtse ba dang // phan tshun 'thun par gyur pa na// dekyai ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sngagasum gdugs gyur te// car 'bab skyabs su nam thur pa// 
6b5(rgyud): ngabasrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo tsha// 'khrul 'khor dang nig yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba re// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis/ 
6b6(rgyud): spos kyi dad ldang ba// mchul thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpor lung ston pa tham ze kod rgyas tshigs su bcad 'a'adi dag thos nas/ li tsabi gzhon nu nga
6b7(rgyud): ten rnams cad kyis mthong na dga' bal tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gnon du mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshogs poche// dpa' deng thabs la mkhas ldan pa/ 
7a1(rgyud): lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyobapa bo// de bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyalago rim bzhin// gnon du bdag pa/ 
7a2(rgyud): ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sbrul rus pa khrag med na// rang bsrel yod por ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la pad pa'i phyir// 
7a3(rgyud): thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston ma da pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
7a4(rgyud): bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas// de nyid khon lung bstan phyir// gtum gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu su ma khri nyis stong gis de bzhin
7a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' das
7a6(rgyud): sa kyang ba gcin kyi tshogs su bcad pa 'di gsus so// sangs rgya mya na yongs mi 'dar// chos kyang chub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smi mdzad byer// yongs su byar na
7b1(rgyud): 'da' bgrod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pasam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems// 
7b2(rgyud): dpar mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shAt+tha thub pa'i mu tshe'i tshad bsrun po thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs
7b3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can tshad med grangs
7b4(rgyud): med pa dag blad med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// de
7b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' midzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi la min/ gser kyang kun du snang ba 'di
7b6(rgyud): ste/ nye ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bzhig sa dang // phyogs mas cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rinapa che'i shing drudran/ rin ma chen gyi srini bsal
7b7(rgyud): bzhugs shing / 'khor ba tu skyong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de la
7b8(rgyud): yin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bu dag byung ba thos sa// de nas kyang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid sa dam thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa di dag rjes sudran no// ngas su dran nas kyang / 
8a1(rgyud): de'i nam 'das dang / rgyal po rabab kyi grong khye chen po na ma byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgo pung bar rag la ba dang / 'jom ldan
8a2(rgyud): yo sa na na/ ma ldan sa pas ma na pas te/ ma ldan das la la gsum kor babyas nas tugs cig tu 'dus so// phyogs sa cig
8a3(rgyud): bya chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das gal bde logs suthal mo sbyor babatu de nas/ mi laman ga rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshogs su dpa bas pa de dag gsol to// 
8a4(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi la mi mthong ba'i len zhes bya ba steg sum pa'o// / nub gcig g.yel ba med par yang // bdag gis mi la mchis pa ni// mdzes pa'i
8a5(rgyud): na mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin rjen
8a6(rgyud): kri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ dachen rab tu 'thu ba
8a7(rgyud): gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ da bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis re// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad ni gyur cig/ de ltar thub dang
8b1(rgyud): 'jigs med 'jigs ni ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon ta kun dang ldan par ltar/ 
8b2(rgyud): khye gtid 'dzin kyang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan ning don tan tu ma cher gyur// rngab ci ye sgra skad 'di jis // sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyang sbyin gyur// sangs
8b3(rgyud): longs 'joms kyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sang gti mug ni gyur cig/ sems can gang dgang ngan song sar gnas te// dam pa'i lus la me lce dbya bar ba// ded
8b4(rgyud): nga rkyen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig zos shog/ sems can kun gyi tsho rabs rgya dag dang // rgyub stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog/ thub pa'i
8b5(rgyud): tog/ rdzun gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rngab tsam sgra skad 'di yis de// sangs rgyas rnams dang rten tu rdzogs rnyed sder// sdig pa'i la 'a rnams rnam par
8b6(rgyud): spongs par shig/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis// de dag bas ma dang smon lam gang yin pa// ri bo che ye kwa skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnam
8b7(rgyud): kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mib 'ad skyes// lus pa me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyibyas med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'byas pa// me rnam sa de dag pa
9a1(rgyud): tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rtenan// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams
9a2(rgyud): gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sngon cad sdig pa'i las// shin
9a3(rgyud): ga kyis/  nga nas/ de gapas gags pa // ya ma yin // sas sems 'dzin da/ dag
9a4(rgyud): mi 'dzin pa sa// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang // byug pa'i rmugs pas rnyegs pa dang // rigs dang yongs spyod rgyags pa da// gnon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ 
9a5(rgyud): gis jig pa gang kyis dang // nyes bsam panyes par smras pi dang // nyes par 'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs sum bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bstis/ 
9a6(rgyud): / kyis pa'i la las pa dang // mAM shes kun pa'i sems dang ni// sdi pa'i thogs pa di dang// nyon mo rnam pa bajug sems dag/ seM ma dge' ba da kyi
9a7(rgyud): mya ngan dang de da da bang dang // nang kyis mchog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang kyis dang // 'phags min skye 'i 'dre ba dang // phrag dogs pa'i rgyudang ni// g.yod
9b1(rgyud): dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phongs pa byung ba dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur ba yis// bdag gis sdig pa
9b2(rgyud): gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba da 'ang dag drag / bkres dang sgom gyi nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // baba' ba dag dang btung ba deng / 
9b3(rgyud): bud med nu dang gos kyi byed// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyib sdig/ nyes par bachud pa rnam gsum bsngags// 
9b4(rgyud): 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ 
9b5(rgyud): dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang mang sangs rgya rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'angags pa/ 
9b6(rgyud): dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang bus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'a chags so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam par
9b7(rgyud): mas ni sangs pa dang // pa marnams la mthus smra// de dag thams sa dpang pa zugs so// thun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod drugapa g+hu dang // rgyal dregs pas bsgribs
9b8(rgyud): bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'a chags so// bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcurnams la mchod par shog/ bdeg gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ 
10a1(rgyud): bsngal kun las 'dod gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de 'ani
10a2(rgyud): gshegs gyur cig/ ri srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsha las// de kun ma ma bkyi nus srid du// sems can de phyir yang ni// bskal 'bye bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pan
10a3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad kyang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa ni// sems ca de dag bstan par bgyi// gang gis bskal pa snyeng rnams so// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bkyis/ 
10a4(rgyud): lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad kyang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag par 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi// bshags pa 'di
10a5(rgyud): dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgyas
10a6(rgyud): yon tan rgya mtsho zab modo// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis// thams cad mkhyedan du rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong dmas dang // gzungs rnams bsam
10a7(rgyud): kyis mi byab dang // dbang stobs kyang chub yan lag gis// spobs btsud ma par 'gyur b.rabagyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam pa ga bigs phrag so// 
10a8(rgyud): thug sapa rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nangs par ra bcug bung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgyarnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// daphyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs
10b1(rgyud): dang bya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par 'gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas rdza
10b2(rgyud): cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag zar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin/ 
10b3(rgyud): gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// 
10b4(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par 'ardzis pa'i las rnam sA can// sman mad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs pas kyis bgang // sdis
10b5(rgyud): de bcabs par mi bya'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyilabakyis dang / 
10b6(rgyud): ngag gis smras// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams gsum por gyis padag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'a chags so// mi dge las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu pa
10b7(rgyud): brten bgyis te// sa bcu la bdag gnas par bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar
10b8(rgyud): mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'jam bu gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams che gzharan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid na// de dag kun la ye ngo // 
11a1(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par 'gyi// srid 'gro nyam
11a2(rgyud): sa pa'i drams ni// shin tu ma ba rad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// sobs brgyam mnyam kun thaM mchis na ni// sdig pa de kunas ma ba shegs par 'gyi// skye ba nyamang srid pa nyam dang/ 
11a3(rgyud): 'jig rten nyam ngag yo sems nyam dang // lus kyi spyod pa nyam sna tshogs kyis// bdog gis sdig pa gang bsngags de 'chags so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i srog
11a4(rgyud): dang phrad pa nya mang dang // srid pa nya mang 'dod chags nyam dang // zhe sdang nyam dag N+DI mug nya mang dang // ngal ba'i nya mang dus kyi nyam dang // bsod nams pasrubs pa nyam dag gis kyang / 
11a5(rgyud): ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor ba shegs par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri dang 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag
11a6(rgyud): la skyabs su yi// rgyal ba de dag kun la ma gros phyag 'tshal// gseng mdog gser ni drim med pa gser kyi 'od// dri med nam dag becu r+ya mi yan lagasbyar// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpa la ga rje
11a7(rgyud): gragos 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab babang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gas
11a8(rgyud): 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdung yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra ba// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/ 
11b1(rgyud): dadape byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya che
11b2(rgyud): da tshogs // skye sa dem dang nga sa dang shes bzhin yar la gdam / 'di ba rnamapa mags lags na pas/ na byid ni nyim bzhin basbyin mngo
11b3(rgyud): byangan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rga ba'i dba' rlabs da// 'khor ba'i klung chen phungs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/ 
11b4(rgyud): rnams kyis snyems// yan lag gas kyi ma dag d+ha rnam par spyod// ye shes gyung gnas 'jig rten seM rnamajug/ ra mi ma mtshan gyi mi ldan la garnams smras pa// sangs
11b5(rgyud): gser sku 'bar la sdug 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpagi med dang // de ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar rir 'do mtha' mtshungs med dang / 
11b6(rgyud): ma tha la yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhas cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' pa shes pa
11b7(rgyud): skyesas+ho/  ma tsha da// sa ma sam ma / bsgral par rgyas dgas pa sa shA sa// sangs rgyas yon nas pa'ang shes mas/ 
11b8(rgyud): yon tan la dag stan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byed bzang po brgyad dus brgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drang 'gyur bar shog/ 
12a1(rgyud): 'dag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mo ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar 'gyi// 'grol phan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi// sems can sngags
12a2(rgyud): mjug gi dab ba brtse// stobs bcas ldar bcas bdu las rgyal bar bgyi// chol gyi lakhor lo dag par bskor bar 'phye// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par brtse// bdus
12a3(rgyud): chu phemasems can tshim par brtsi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol byin drug bla med rdzogs par 'gyi// nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bas pa par bsti// 'dod
12a4(rgyud): gi sdang gti mug zhi bar bkri// skye ba brgya dang skyeb kye ba spyod// bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par loH// thub pa'i dbang ba rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gi sung ni rgya chen thos par 'akye// bdag sa
12a5(rgyud): ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bci// zheng nas
12a6(rgyud): srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun ni gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan la gtams// de kun de dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nang btapa nyam nu
12a7(rgyud): nyam pa dang // phyogs bcu dag na skabs med gyur ba rnams// de kun myar dund las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun dgras bsdigs pas dalnga
12a8(rgyud): sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur ba// sems can nyis thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag pus// 'jigs mchog me ba bad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag padags shes
12b1(rgyud): bas bcings gzir ba// phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gaH/ ur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag dums dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa me bzang bya ngan sna tshogs rlung // de dag thams cad bcings las zo'o// 
12b2(rgyud): grwa cing // 'ardeg pa dag ni 'ardeg las ba bar shog// bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs gyur thams cad 'dzegs pa med par shog/ thams can gang dag bkres sred sgom rjes
12b3(rgyud): ing // de dag pas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ len pas yid 'ong sman pas thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis snga chags gos te
12b4(rgyud): sems can dngul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen po tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad 'di dang ldad par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur/ 
12b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shes par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ ba
12b6(rgyud): ma thag tu de dag klub gyur cig/ rnga da tsa te'u pi bar smra stan dang // rtswa mig mtsho 'du rjing bu lteng ba dang // gse gyi ba ma ud pal pad ma can// ngas sbom gos nor mu tig nor bud kyi
12b7(rgyud): ser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu thub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sbram byung // sems cad gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyung // de dag thams cad
12b8(rgyud): rgya chen dang // len tshun du ni 'od pyad 'gyung bar shog/ mi ye 'jig rten phun sum tshigs gang 'di// de dag gang du bsams par skye bar gyur// bsam pa thams cad pasams ma lag tulapa/ 
13a1(rgyud): bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang bye ma me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab
13a2(rgyud): // sems can dag yin /  / de ban gshegs pa bsamasas tham da // ga nga chub sems dpe rgyun pas dang/ la bra la dre dpa
13a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa tho bgyur cig/ 1
13a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'phrogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po rigs su skye ba shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byong gur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dpa ba dog gis// bskal pa
13a5(rgyud): mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu por gyur to// dpal//  rtul pod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun tag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyid pa drug la
13a6(rgyud): spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dgan rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs dran chen bai DUr+ya'i// khril bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag pos grwar shog
13a7(rgyud): bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrub pa y-i// brid pa nya ma nga tron pa dgang bskus sa // sdig la sa gang don mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad pa lus pa dgyur cig/ sems can gang dag srin
13a8(rgyud): bcings nas su// 'khor ba'i nags pa'i zag pas dam bcingab// shes rab ga gis bcings pa bkrola'ang sho// sdug bsngal rnams las myur du thar gyur cheg/ sems cad kang dga'angs du
13b1(rgyud): 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams na gzhan nams na// bsad nams sna tshogs pa' se rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su mi rang // lus sra dang med gyes bslabs pa yi// bdag gis rjems
13b2(rgyud): yi rang bsod nams de// bdag ni sron chub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chu'i dul bral klu med po 'gyur cig// gang dag tag dang drim bral ba dang // dri med med kyis phyaga'atsha lo bstod pa dang // yongs su bsdu
13b3(rgyud): ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cu ngan song spong bar gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med pa la ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal pa gang bstod pa/ 
13b4(rgyud): rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// 
13b5(rgyud): gang dag rna ba'i bu kar bshags pa 'di ni brags 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas gcig sheg na nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi pa ma yin lnga min bcu la min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gagan
13b6(rgyud): das dka' byas pa yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa
13b7(rgyud): med pa'i mdo// bam po gnyis pa/ de dus bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mad 'a tsho de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser kyil
13b8(rgyud): pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/ 
14a1(rgyud): rgyal ba gang dag rdza krung dang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i mijig rten dag na gang bzhugs pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal bde dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ 
14a2(rgyud): dbang gi zhing rab ni rnam par da // sta ni gseng ci mdog tur 'acu ga da'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa'i gsung // bung ba ma bya
14a3(rgyud): na po'i di bu// mgo nam ming rgya 'i byin tsasha 'dra// khabadud lta/ rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tugasar ltar rnam par mdzes par gdal// spyan ni re zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ud pal sngon po
14a4(rgyud): pa 'dra// ljags ni zhing legs la pa da ma'i mdo// pad ma dra snang pad ma'i be ba 'dra// zhab kyi mdzongs pa da mdud dang 'dra// be dUr+ya'i mi dag 'drag yas su 'khyil// ba pa'i thab bla zhing zlab za pa
14a5(rgyud): li lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal la mtho ba'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'ang ma zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ngo mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mcho
14a6(rgyud): rab 'phags// su li bu gnas ner de skyes// surnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil bste// mngon ma ming 'od 'bar 'tsher na srung mo can/ ma gyi mgrin sug 'dru bar srol mangs// bltas ma thag tu sgra yis da
14a7(rgyud): phyogs bcu 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba
14a8(rgyud): ri dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gron mas su// sems cad dedag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad ni// ma dog medag pabang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btso ma'i gser sa
14b1(rgyud): sdang ba'i sku// bdeg shegs zla ba rab su dri med nal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med nal// gnan nub tsas 'drar lus yan laga'ang ma// seng ge 'dra bar tshul gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag
14b2(rgyud): de rab tu rab ste// sa la'i lcags rnying gis paspyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od bar rabatu gtod// nyim stong snying rab tu lhag ga'o// thub pa'i dbang po'i skumachog dri ma med// deng rnams ma ra/ 
14b3(rgyud): yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'di ni rnam par lha de bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan phyed rna ba nyi ma mang po dag
14b4(rgyud): nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag steng rnams ni// gang rnams mtha' yas steng breg brgya dgan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan
14b5(rgyud): yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sde 'dra rgyal pa'i phyag// phyag dang skabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das
14b6(rgyud): gang dag ga ba'i dul skyed kyang ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yed lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa
14b7(rgyud): dang // dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i mad tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rabs tshogs dum ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lde brgya yis// sangs rgyas yo
14b8(rgyud): par mi nus so// byam ba gcig gi yon tan nams kya de// kye steng gis kya cung bad brjod ma rug// bdag gis byas bdag ni thams cad na// yodan tan sdes byas 'arjod pa ga la nus// sna
15a1(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad 'am gyur te// sred pa'i rtse mo man chad tus gang ba// sgra yi rtse mos dpag par dus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus pa
15a2(rgyud): ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsagapa gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos
15a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'dabs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing // de
15a4(rgyud): bzhags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal bstod pad ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa spong du rnyed dka
15a5(rgyud): de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho la mthar pa khri/ pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyi nas byang chub bla med thob
15a6(rgyud): par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni ldong pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smid pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi// der ni bdag gis lung bsta
15a7(rgyud): thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu po de dag gnyig dang // byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can ga
15a8(rgyud): dgaganas dben pa ci// byag pa sa thal nas yongs par gyur pa dang // de gal pa ma sa dus rnams dang // spyod sung ga rten byangs dang rten gyur gog/ sdug bsngal kun byung bdapa bya
15b1(rgyud): / dge bdun gyi'i b+hang gnas 'gyur bar shog/ san mtha' 'das pa de dag srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byung chu ba spyad par bgyi// gser med dam pa mi ni bshags pa yis// bdag zhe / 
15b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyam ma zhes par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho ba dkur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya ma tsho med par sho// bdag gi nga so rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med pa 'dam pa'i// 9/ 
15b3(rgyud): ge ye shes rgya mtshon ma dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog/ byang chub yon tan rin ldan rdzogs gyur cig/ gser 'od dam pa'i bshegs pa'i stobs kyi sa na// bdag gi bsod nam par
15b4(rgyud): ldang bar shog/ 'dag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag kyar// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'odo na snang bar dog/ bsod nams snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir/ 
15b5(rgyud): legs gyur cag/ bsod sa stobs dang rtag rje snar shoka/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la sa dri rgol ba dang // bde'i kun gyi byamathong dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spya gyi// 'dzi
15b6(rgyud): sa sdod med gshegs// de dag zhing ni tel ba thams cadaH/ yon tan mtha' yas kyang 'phags rje 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drab shu
15b7(rgyud): /  ma po las/ 'das pa ma 'ongs pa dang / dalta gyu ba'i dri zhin gshegs pa thams cad la baspyod pa me tog pa da ma'i byung gnas shes kya le
15b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni tshe chags su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// pam mi byes mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag // stong ba chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de ltabasan
16a1(rgyud): mchog dam pa 'dir// steng pa'i chos rnams medo tsam pa da pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas nam
16a2(rgyud): mi gas poso// tshig gi dbang po gzugs gyu rnams kyu// na pa'i dbang pe sgra rnam par spyod//  yi ba ba chags dri rnams //  me dbang tsun ma cu/  ba ga pa / 
16a3(rgyud): drug/ yid kyi dbang po ches rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag pan tun te// rang dang yul la reg tu 'jug par byed// sems de rnam lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam smod de/ 
16a4(rgyud): mi nis thong stod rgyam pa dang // dmag chom kun dgrad gnas pa bde// de ltar sems ni rdul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod sul dag kyang rab shes pa/ dkang sems na
16a5(rgyud): // sa spyo sa 9/ shA yo de/ da / sem ma pa rnams // da
16a6(rgyud): thugs pa kya zhin gas pam gyi// da ga da ga du nam pa/ dang pod de shes pa bdag nyid byed//  nigal pa mi na byed pams// gang kyim kyi rkyen las grang ba yin// pas
16b1(rgyud): ba yin yongs su rtog las kyu// grong srong las kyi 'khrul la khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang med chu dang blung rnams ni// gzhan du gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig
16b2(rgyud): rtag tu pan kun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi phul rnams bzhi pa dadag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thung su lo// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams su
16b3(rgyud): dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi skal dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi srul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar
16b4(rgyud): sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// se mos dang rnam gos kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan drung dang mkhris pa za gyur na// 4
16b5(rgyud): nigacin dang ngan sngags rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang ba
16b6(rgyud): // chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag tshe 'byung min// ma byung ba las phyung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung la// de phyi
16b7(rgyud): 'byung ba che des ngas brjod do// yod pa min zhing gzhar yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du shes dam shes ying
16b8(rgyud): dag zugs sa dang // sum med du dang gdang tshang ba dang // pre nga men pa ne zhin srid pa da// byed na ge bye nod panam pa// la ba'i drug pasngal bsam kyis ma // ra pa
17a1(rgyud): mang ltar gnas pa dag/ mabyung ba las byung dang me 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bad gi lta bar cung ba bcad par gyis// ye shes ral bris can
17a2(rgyud): mongs rgya mo drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par bgyis// ngas ni ra sgo mang bye// bdud ci le nu ba'i sdud kyang kun tu bstad// ngasan du
17a3(rgyud): grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud ci'i thub pa bdag chem bya// ngas na chos kyi chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi drang gi ma chog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/ 
17a4(rgyud): chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsumaN+Dal
17a5(rgyud): dmas bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur gA/ rten med zla cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs ni byas napa// bdud rtsi le bub bsil bas tshim par byed
17a6(rgyud): dpyir bskal bdu bar sngon chadangs// 'dren pa bsam gyes mi kyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi thu de yongs su tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / 
17a7(rgyud): nalag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang// nor dbyig nor gu sa tig rgyan dang gser// baidUr+ya dang don chen sna tshogs btang // song gsum shing sngon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang / nags
17a8(rgyud): tsal dag dngas las ni// skyes pa thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad byer 'drugs nas// ra phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam me ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par// phye ma'i phung bar srungs
17b1(rgyud): na ni// da gzus dbyeb sa// sam rnas ni med 'a dmas// stong gsum dag na thams cad ci// dum 'ams bsam gyis mi bya pa// sems na kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems canan
17b2(rgyud): gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phyem bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan me rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar dus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen
17b3(rgyud): nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'odo dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa
17b4(rgyud): kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang rnams stan las la
17b5(rgyud): gos brag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhungs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
17b6(rgyud): ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
17b7(rgyud): / dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyi
17b8(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i lang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin
18a1(rgyud): bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skebs pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol
18a2(rgyud): dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu go'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi par bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gapa' thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu ni bar bgyid pa/ bya
18a3(rgyud): gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
18a4(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khub 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'dis ga'i chen pos rnas
18a5(rgyud): par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang de dag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa btsam
18a6(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding da
18a7(rgyud): deng mi'am ci dang lte phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bkyi'o// 'byung ba mtshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'brog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
18a8(rgyud): rgyal po cher po bzhig nod sbyin gyi sde pon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang gnod sbyin pa rgya stong phrag dum dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i miganam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad sa
18b1(rgyud): blta bar 'gyi bsrung bar bskye yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das der slad du/ bdag cag rgyal ba ched pa'i jig rte myang nas ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang spyad/ 
18b2(rgyud): 'jam bu'i gling 'dir/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur rem/ mu ge'i gnod pa' ma nad kyi gnod pa 'am gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong dang gnod pa brgya phrag stong
18b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhig ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan
18b4(rgyud): 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du ma chi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal ba dzo de yul de dang de sa
18b5(rgyud): turgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang g.yul du ba
18b6(rgyud): sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ches smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam mi'i rgyal pa
18b7(rgyud): giser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan te thos nas/ mdosde'i dbang po dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir ro/  ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su'i dzi pa dang
18b8(rgyud): yongs su skyed par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po ni yum de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / 
19a1(rgyud): yongs su bzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang ni pa dang bde lags su 'gyur bar 'gyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po ni ma dge slong ma dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen
19a2(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar gyur ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cadan gnas
19a3(rgyud): sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dges
19a4(rgyud): nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bgyid bla mar bgyid rim gror babyed cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal
19a5(rgyud): thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi ches bla ma rab kyi ches rim grong ba che ches mchod par bgyi ste yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
19a6(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyod ling legs so legs so// 'di lta ste khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
19a7(rgyud): padz+ra sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byas pa'o// 'di lta ste khyed yun reng por sems can thams
19a8(rgyud): la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang 'de bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sem
19b1(rgyud): can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po kyad pa zhes/ mi rgyal ba nas pa'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod ba dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la
19b2(rgyud): kun srung bar ces shig/ yongs su bskyab ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang ni ba dang bde legs su 'byung bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyam po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod kyi nabatu spong
19b3(rgyud): du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsnyungs pa dang yongs su bzung bar yang #
19b4(rgyud): ro/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 2
19b5(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa bdo sde'i da'ang ba'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmig tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa/ de dag sa
19b6(rgyud): bkrung ba kyes sheg/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang yongs su bzung ba dang yongs su bsgying ba dang ni ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'a
19b7(rgyud): bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags kyis pa dang rgyam ma chen pa mig me bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bdo
19b8(rgyud): su thal po sbyang ba bdud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ grong ngam grong khyer ngamathong da
20a1(rgyud): lam ldongs sam yul labar ngam pa brang 'khor gang du byed par 'gyur ba dang / ma'ajam po gang dang gang gis yul du skrod par gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me'i rgyam bar
20a2(rgyud): gyur ba gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyam po'i bstan bcos 'dis/ rgyal bab kyid cing rtag par rgyun drugasar 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tu ma rim grong bkyid dam mchod par ba
20a3(rgyud): ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma ma sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la bang bsdu snang bgyid btsun par bgyid rim gror ba gyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'ad dam pa mdos
20a4(rgyud): 'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khri ba 'dis bdang / cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / g.yog rnams dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par
20a5(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
20a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gre dang pa grong
20a7(rgyud): grong rdal la me yul 'khor ram po brang 'khor gangan/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag rgya mche bar bgyi'o// mo'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa med sde'i dbang po'i rgya
20a8(rgyud): 'dim nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang mchod par bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba deng ne ba dang 'o
20b1(rgyud): su 'gyung bar brje'o// rgyam po ba brang mthong de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad nga
20b2(rgyud): dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi
20b3(rgyud): pi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra bla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan
20b4(rgyud): 'das nam dgra gla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig/ yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de
20b5(rgyud): tshede'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid dkyi la zhus dgrazla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyid par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyen na yang / yul 'akru
20b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug par 'gyur rgyal ba'i 'khrug pa mi babad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu
20b7(rgyud): pabacom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin pa na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal
20b8(rgyud): deyan lag bzhi pa'i dmag pa sogs te/ pha ros kyi dmag tshogs sum che ba'i slad du nga gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der 'chi 'tshal bdang / gang gse sa
21a1(rgyud): dmapa mad sa'i dbang ba'i rgyal po'i di gnas pa la rdul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bamam ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhid dbyung dang / 
21a2(rgyud): bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig lus mi gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pas kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bkye'o// khrel ba
21a3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bslab par bgyi'o// 'gegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste yul der pha rol gyi dpag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi rus na/ yul gnag par bgyid par lhag la 'gyur/ de nas
21a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bani dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs solags so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal ba grangs med/ bye ba khraga'i
21a5(rgyud): brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'odadam pa lado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal ba 'di nyan pa dang rimag byed pa dang bacho
21a6(rgyud): ba de dag la kun tu bsrung bgyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang ni ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bgyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho grang lakhor da/ 
21a7(rgyud): dang grong khur de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba kyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur
21a8(rgyud): kyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa nga gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang srog cig/ 'jam pa'i gling thams cad naganas pa
21b1(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang 'chang mi 'dru ba dang me rtsod pa dang mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad kyi bzhi
21b2(rgyud): de dka na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des bangon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan chen rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun
21b3(rgyud): bar 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi sas bsngags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gcig pa

21b7(rgyud): dang rgyu skar dang zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang no
21b8(rgyud): dad 'thubams cad 'byo sa 'thung / mangs myed che pa dang ma ldamad par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dgeb babu mas kye ya nga ldanam gyug sal cher ba de 'grom rtse kyi
22a1(rgyud): rten du skye bar shur/ lha'i kha gyi ma rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la sheg mi'i rgyal por gyur la gser 'dadapa pa

23b1(rgyud): tshe de'i dub na/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal

26a3(rgyud): khams 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rnga mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang re re rgyal po rab bye ba phrag brgya dang ri re rgyal po 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po bya ba
