71a4(rgyud): h+lA//  sa da da mtshungs// dpal ldan ma thos dru bzhin gan// de can rnams kyi blangs gnas legs// se ge blangs min pa ng+gA 'i gros// klung chen byos pa bzhin
71a5(rgyud): rnams kyis ni brgyan par gyur// b+had bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// grub pa la ni skyabs su mche// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// bsrungs pa dus su nye bar gnas// sangs rgya
71a6(rgyud): mas pashad pa yi// stong chen rang 'joms mdo sde di// khor khor yug ri mtha'i bar// mtshams gcod pa yidam pa lags/ 
71b1(rgyud): mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal po thung rkyenas// thang mo su te phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka'
71b2(rgyud): stsal pa/ rgyal ba chen po dag khyod kyi 'khor dmim khor la 'tshe ba sems pa de ni tshul mayin no// de ci'i phyi ma de/ si'i jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang / dpe
71b3(rgyud): 'dun legs par bsgrubs pa de las bon 'di btab na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
71b4(rgyud): / dride 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dag kyang dpag rnams bzhi dang ldan pa nas gleng bzhi la dbang
71b5(rgyud): bi'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sIr dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la yang bu dpa' ra/ rtsub phod pa/ 
71b6(rgyud): gi gzugs dang ldan pa chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'dzabs pa/ rin po che sna bdud dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na mjig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu
71b7(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur bar byed snying las chung ngus gnas pas gnas par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus po g.yas pa'i lha ngas
71b8(rgyud): ya gas te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang skyed mo 'tshal
72a1(rgyud): / dang gzhal med khang dang khang pa brtsags pa dang bsil khang dang sgo khang dang rta babs dang skar khung dang / dar gyi lnga ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang
72a2(rgyud): dril bu dang mu tig gi dra bas yongs su bskor ba dang / pog phor nas bdug pas bdug pa dag dang me tog gis gtor bas khyim dang gnas dang khang pa chen po dag mchis te der bdag cag du ma
72a3(rgyud): rgya phrag stong dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshang bar spyad pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu myos pas bag ma mchis par gnas
72a4(rgyud): pas gnas pan/ 'khor bas dang sbom tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu byer zhing skyes pa dang bu med dang khye'u dang bu mo dang btsas ma thag pa dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chag 'dum
72a5(rgyud): kye ma dngas 'phrogs 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgegs bgyid gsod par bgyid srog dang bral bar bgyid de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi
72a6(rgyud): tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gis 'khor gyi gdon byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyid te/ nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i ming nas
72a7(rgyud): dri tshogs kyis rang gi la gnas bdug par bgyi'o// dogs la ma togasil ma bkram ste/ thugs mar dbus la mchod rten de la mchod par bkye'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
72a8(rgyud): khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btabs pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir nod cing 'jigs par 'gyur// sla bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/ 
72b1(rgyud): nga//  r+dz+dza / sa ga pagac-id//  pa byung //  shig / 
72b2(rgyud): ga ba ga la gas/  nas sa / sa pa/  sa / sa zhes a hwA s+t+waM/  yin ma ma ma
72b3(rgyud): / bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnam grub par gyur cig/ rgyal po chen po na ma thos kyi bu'i ming dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul
72b4(rgyud): khong srung sten las langs te/ blogos phrag pa gcig tug par nas pum mo g.yas pa'i ltungs pa bcugs te/ bcom ldan padas gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
72b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor dri ro'i gdon gyis btag 'i tshul gyi mtshan mni du ma bu lags te/ glu len cing na tho brdudung ste// rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid// bdam pa ma mchis
72b6(rgyud): med par smra// rgod par bgyid cing khro bar bkur// snyom par 'gyur la mig dmar te// rtag tu rim gyis pa dbus par bgyid// mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de// rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar babyed
72b7(rgyud): de la sngags kyis cheg mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag sa gson// skad pa med na/ a le/ na'e/ bAn be/ b+han d+he/ ba ng+ge/ tsapa le gangapa ba ga ne/ kha ne/ akhe nin le ne/ brtsa le/ b+ha9/ 
72b8(rgyud): rtagan dge bge bag brnyan swA hA/ rgyal po chen po 'u 'khor srung gi ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyugs dang / byi kyis bdag gdon thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las thar bar gyur cig swA hA/ 
73a1(rgyud): sa mas das nyid jug di cesan po to// chom ldan das dag shes mi dgas thal thas kyis zin memam mtshanapa'i di / 
73a2(rgyud): slom pa dengs pa skyed// g.yongags ta / pa gyur// bzhin pa dus 'o ga bye byung // bstsus nas la nyas la gyu gyur// 'dog dmas ldang sa/ 
73a3(rgyud): ( mI/ 'ay-i/ ka b.le/ ka shin/ karbe/ kA li/ kA mi ni'i nga le/ bi b+he gi sa ni sam pa te/ sham/ shas ni swAny+dza/ rgyal po chen po ma lags skyes pa'i ming dang / 
73a4(rgyud): kyis padag zhi gdon du/ gan mams pa med gyur ga swAH/ de nas thal bayin pa mig nga kun 'a langs te/ blan smrig pa kyi ngas grum mogs
73a5(rgyud): das cugs ldan dasags pa sogs sa ma /  nga she rdzug da ces gas // chos ldan das bdag gi
73a6(rgyud): gdod kyis ca la tshul gyi mchen pa na 'i bu lags te/ skyegs sa mas she dazugs ba kyi// de bzhin dbugs kya gas bgyur// du shing dbug pa 'byung // kyi skye ga
73b1(rgyud): sa pa gar//  'anan /  na ga // na pa par cad // dgas mas da// de ga ga / 
73b2(rgyud): 'gro sa gso// rlud sa g+hu/ bA /  zla / b+h+ya/ skye ba \u0f7fste/ b+h+yaH/ gyu/ rtse// mag ge/ sa/ ma 9/  u e/ 
73b3(rgyud): /  ste/ g+has/ sa /  'i// ya nAH/ tshan la /  / skye kyi la grang kAb+h+yaH
73b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdur du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ nga ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sku mchog lta bu rgya chen po
73b5(rgyud): yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i sakhor lo bskor // lded mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i// bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu baN+Dal// sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// rigs sngags rnams cadadangs
73b6(rgyud): / skad bzi dang / las dge/ khan te/ bal ba te/ bal bte/ ba la ni b+h+yo/ shU re/ pU rab te badz+ras me/ badz+rag me badz+ra d+ha re/ s+yAm b+he/ dzaM d+he d+he n+ya swa re/ bi dzo bi g+ha She/ ba dang khA p+te/ ar
73b7(rgyud): de shi bi g+huSh+Te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas
73b8(rgyud): kyis ni gsuMng thos nas// 'jig dang lpags dang dadangs gyur te/ zam po sbyar nam sod par byung // byung bar tshigs ni lhag sa rnams// dang ngas bkrugs rang rong por gyur nas// phyogs brgyar rab tu khyer
74a1(rgyud): byed cid// sgram yang skrag par byed// rgyal pa chen pos dkris nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smra// ces rig sngags rig sngags che// stong chen rab tu joms
74a2(rgyud): byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// thos nas 'byung po sgragagyur te// dper na rab tu babar me dang // tI lam dang btags ral gri bzhin// gau ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i// rig sngags
74a3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i zhags pas med par 'gyur// me ni rab tu 'bar byas nas// bla dang 'og da
74a4(rgyud): bzhir yang // sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor de// nas dang yungs kar blangs nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me yinang du blugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// 
74a5(rgyud): myur du mi gteng na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni// mar dang yungs kar mer blugs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba mi rnyed de// de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni/ 
74a6(rgyud): 'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa na// sha ba kri'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grags dang ldan
74a7(rgyud): zhe yid 'khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te// 'byung po mang po tshogs pa na// stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag ni dkyil 'khor du// zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur/ 
74a8(rgyud): rab 'joms mdo sde la// gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje 'char khros te// spyi bo dag ni 'gems por 'gyur// spu gros ni rtsub po yis// de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur// 
74b1(rgyud): spyod pa yis// de A nga nagagatsad// sna 'am ma dras// sa sa gagags pa byed// thob sngags kyis dkris pams// das gang sa 'angams par byed// nag na
74b2(rgyud): dron ma dag/ de ye kha nas 'jig par 'gyur// rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// mkhor ba gnod sbyin dkyil la yo du// de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur// 
74b3(rgyud): dpal ldan pa// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te// bzang po'i bril 'dug pa ni// shang phyogs na ni yul khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs
74b4(rgyud): // byang phyogs na ni rdzas ngan po// dpal dang ga'i brjid dbang ba y-i// rgyal po dgra ni phyin pa dang // de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen// bar snang gnas pa tu phags// tshangs pa A la
74b5(rgyud): zhar yang bang // der ni rje'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar khod phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan gser gyi ring 'dra// gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshur/ 
74b6(rgyud): me tog pad ma bzhin du rgyas// sa la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dang 'dra b+hAnya la// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin// thub sku gser gyi la dog pa// mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/ 
74b7(rgyud): dag rten mes po tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten smon ma bstod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sdang ni// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong gi sapor rnams kyis// rjes su bstan pa
74b8(rgyud): // ga kyis sems sangs rgyas dang // lam rgya dag byung chu zhi //  sa tan thos dmas kya // mas kyang skyeb bgyur// se da pan la gdugs skye/ 
75a1(rgyud): oM mas kya sa kyi/  mau / na sa kyi//  ga sto sas na da // ma y-i byed sa gnod pa /

75a5(rgyud): phya dbu la// gnod par byed ci che bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa// 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol gnon pa ston par bya/ 
75a6(rgyud): ge sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor// kun du chad pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// yang dag par yang brjod par bgyi// gang gi 'byung po'i dkyil la khor du/ 
75a7(rgyud): 'di bshad pa nA mi nyan pa// de dag chad po bshad par bya// rjengs pas sprul pa'i ma snga'o// sangs rgya sa na bas la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni blta byas nas// bi dUr+ya dngags dang
75a8(rgyud): dadrug/ mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // sdug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi// rtsibs stong bdog gsar 'dra ba'i// shing te rnam pa bzhi byas po// ba rnams
75b1(rgyud): kun dang ldan pa s+ho// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' 'a 'gro/ rgya po dag ni nga zugs nas// 'byung ba'i dkyil la rje nyid du dang // sa ni gas phyil dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mdu
75b2(rgyud): bai klung da spud pa dang // zhigs pa dag kyang gdags byos la/ phyonas kyis ni kyi snyed pa'i// phung po mas cad sridag gces/ gan ni ston sde pon kun// phyogs bani ga tu dgye ba byas
75b3(rgyud): stong chen ra N+Di joms pa yi// mdo sa yin dam pa 'di// tshangs pa'i 'jig tan ba du t+te // lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po yi lus kyis su// gnod sbyin da ni srin po brtul/ 
75b4(rgyud): sa ngan po ma chig thos nas// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// dri las byung gdon gyi rnams// shar
75b5(rgyud): phyogs chen 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i nags pas de dag rkun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs// 
75b6(rgyud): phyogs pa 'di 'ashong ba dag/ mad sa nags pa'i de dag kun// li lnga yis bsdams pa ste// 'byung ngo mang po la nyon// rngub pa thong bo nyin btung // kAlas gdon du gyur ba rnams/ rje
75b7(rgyud): phyogs cha 'dir 'azod pa dag/ mdo sde zhags pas de dag kud// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung byom dpyod la nyon// 'bru 'byung ba nyi shub t+yang // gri nod sbyin las n-i gdon gyur pa// 4kye
75b8(rgyud): 'di 'asong pa dag/ mad pa'i gags pas de dag blan//  lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'alung ming bongs nyon// sum na pam du myo// rkyen du rgyal me yinani// demadun dayos kyi/

78a1(rgyud): drazhan yang dang na// gzug dran mor bcas pa la// rnam par 'phrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng she dang ni stag dang ta// ma he ba lang bang rung // glang batsha po gzugs 'dra dang/

79a4(rgyud): po sa // jigs shes nas pang//  ma ma yod// nas ste snru basmos dang / mdun sogs te// ba ma ni pa sa/ man
79b1(rgyud): 'du ba dag/ rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lpags// phyag 'tshal skye bu dab 'byod pa// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog spyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal spyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
79b2(rgyud): namagon pa'i spya sa du// de dag lhags par gyur pa dang // de nas rgyas byonam thos thus// 'jig nyin ma nan la 'di skad gsol// bod ga gi phyogs ma byang phyogs su// rgyal pa'i gnas dusprul pa ni
79b3(rgyud): lcang lor ldan pa phod du mchi// de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can// lha rnams kun gyis bsam par gyur// phyir shin du mthed po can// rin chen kun gyi brgyan pa
79b4(rgyud): 'phang du dbag tshad kun drug ste// gse gyi rgya las bgyis pa lags// phyogs bzhi lcogs ni de ril 'dra// gnod sbyin do rje 'tshang ba dag/ kun nas rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ 
79b5(rgyud): par sprul// rgyal po'i pheM brang de yi sgo// bzhi po btong bar bgyis pa ni// gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste// gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags// bzhi pa gse
79b6(rgyud): kyikyi rnam par spras// grong khyer de yi nang dag na// bskyed mos tshal gyi me tog rgyas// de yi nang na gzhal med pang // rin chen bdund cu sna tshogs mchis// rin chen sna tshogs sngon cing can// bya bran sna tshogs

80a3(rgyud): bus bskor ba ste// tsan dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags// kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste// khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag/ gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste// gnyis pa dngus las

86a7(rgyud): 'dir dge bar shog/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa 'amangon te bar snang 'bod pa dag/ skyed ku rnams pa rtag tu byams byed gog// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shokr-i/ 'di nI k+Sha
86a8(rgyud): dag rgyal bde na gang gis// gan du bden pa gsum shing bdun med pa// bden pa di yis 'di ni dge bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa chelas thar gyur cig sA tra/ skyed bzed de/ 
86b1(rgyud): mo gdod mas da pa byed pa man na dashegs par kyi rlom da pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na kyim gyi sangs rgyas bya N+Da'o// las rgya kyi das
86b2(rgyud): de 'dun gyi gnas setshangs pa'i gnas so// dbang po'i gnas so 'jig rten spong ba'i gnas so// dbang phyug gi gnas so// drang srong chen po'i gnasas 'byung po'i gnas sa mig gi gnas so// hU~M la gnas
86b3(rgyud): / sa kyi gnas so// kun pa'i gnas so// sangs rgya rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par sangs kyis pa nyin sa rnams kyi rigs par// so pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa 'i dbang pos
86b4(rgyud): 'o 'jig rten skyeb rnams kyi mchod pa'o// dbang phyug gis phyag byas pa'o// lhathams cad kyis kun mchod pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// mkhas pa rnams mngon par dag
86b5(rgyud): 'gyur pa'o// drang srong rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'o// tshangs pa rnams kyi rab tu brgyan pa'o// sgra rnams kyis mngon par stong pa'o// khrus byed pa rnams kyis bas pa'o// rigs pazhi'i
86b6(rgyud): dada' bar byas pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lo// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed pos tshapa lo// drang srong rnams kyi gnas so// nyan thos rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o// nas 'byor do
86b7(rgyud): rnams kyi gnas so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o// bag la nyal gyi zug du rnams 'byin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam kun tu ston pa'o// 
87a1(rgyud): sa da na tshogs sa ma byung bu bar byed pa// dmyam kyi nga bsgril par byed pa'o// la yo 'o// mtshornam pa'o// da ba'i rgya mtshor ltung/ 
87a2(rgyud): ba'i sems can thams cad slol pa'o// bdud kyi nags pa gcod pa'i bdud kyi gapor snad par byed pa'o// 'dud kyi mchil du 'do nga 'o// nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o// mya ngan las
87a3(rgyud): 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o// s+yAd ya the dan// ban+de/ rne kha rno go/ u sho d+ha ne sA ra thi pra b+he de'i bu la pra b+he saM kad+hiHbi kaR+sha Ni bi sha gra ba te cung
87a4(rgyud): d+haswA n+ti/ ba/ ti/ bAs ni sogs pagu ti pu srA ga r+b+he/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig pa dang nye bar 'cha ba dang ngam pa thams cad las pad legs su gyu tsig swAhA/ nga
87a5(rgyud): napo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye
87a6(rgyud): maskyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni lha dang mi dang lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab paste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong byer bla na med par zhugs so// de'i don gyi phyir sngon
87a7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams dang pham dang sbyin gnas dang bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen bkur to// tshangs

87b1(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis skad gcig dang blo gas gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das pa phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ kye ma rog sngags rag sung

87b3(rgyud): 'joms pa'i mdo// phyag rgya bdag cag stsal bar bgyi// mi gang rab tu sdang ba dang // bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa// de dag tshangs pas sprul pa yi// rig sngags chad pas gcad par bgyi// brgya byin

92a1(rgyud): po 'di dag gis// mtshan rnams rjes su 'azung 'di phyir ni rab brjod cing // kun du bskyab pa byas na de yi lus la ni// mi dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ 
92a2(rgyud): gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas// gagadams mtshan rnams kyis ni gdab par gags pa las// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rdzas su dran na ni// mtshon ma de dag dum bu dum bu
92a3(rgyud): 'phrul// zhas te mtshon ma rnams ni thog par gyu na yang // man pa cha nams ma rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// de'i lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyur te// sngan chad byas pa gang yin pa ni ma gto

92a6(rgyud): spong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di// byis pa rnams la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// gang gis dang por

92a8(rgyud): rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang // drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong // lha rnams ji sa
92b1(rgyud): sa pa da// de kun mo yi 'jog rten na// 'di las smyos pa gag ga/ nu chen mnga' la 'tshal ba la// gnod sbyin srin pa 'don mchis// rgyal po rnams kyis mthang mi nus// bstan par
92b2(rgyud): yang ni mi nus so// gang ma du ni mi chags dang // gang gi mngal ni mi gnas dang // skyes pa bud med 'du ba da// dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid// med mer po dang dur nur po// bu yis bon
92b3(rgyud): gang yang mdul ni thur du gyur// sham mi 'byung gnod pa gyid pa// de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag lags na// 'jam pa po dang ri dgas rgyal/

131b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi stongs gang dang // dpra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang // bzhin gshegs pa'i gzing da byas// das nang dmigs 'gyur bar byas// kun dga' ba rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rma bya chen mos dugs
131b2(rgyud): dge slongs re bde legs su gyur cag/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
131b3(rgyud): 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dge slong sa reg la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ril chad pa spang bar byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs

131b5(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang / bde legs 'gyur ba byas pas tshe dang ldan pa dge slongs rind de las sos so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'ang
131b6(rgyud): la ba deng song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ci ltar gyung ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das le gsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu
131b7(rgyud): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das

136a2(rgyud): kyang // de la nyan dang mtshan rnams su// bsrung bar byed de the tsom med// brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang po rtog pa che// sman drug tu dang tshogs kyi dbadre//

136b1(rgyud): batshan ma 'ad// bud me da ka shag rtag 'char na// de sa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rtag par mang lan du chags// nga pa rnams na yang bdab ste// sum ma ngag kyang bad bar 'gyur// nad dang ldog pa thams cad

137a2(rgyud): ThaH// tsul sa rba/ tsa9 tsa9/ mu me le mu tsa la/ dza ye bi yes sa pa la yig te/ sarbas rbag nas pak+Sha/ sa nga/  / mang po // ga na / rgo hU~M/ ste na /  man+ta pan ni/ bcom ldan/ 
137a3(rgyud): 'das ma sems can 'dren ma kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba rnams cad dang / na thams cad las bsrung drug
137a4(rgyud): srung du gsol/ ra tsho/ bi byeng / d+ho d+hi / beg ta/ A pa ra Na/ bi go d+ha ne/ ba bid+ha/ rU ba raH/ bi nA sha ne/ mr-i ya?/ mu \u0f7f mu \u0f7f/ mu li mu la~M N+Di ma~M ci lo/ ka mi g-i 9/ me la mi lI/ ka sa la/ bim l-I/ 
137a5(rgyud): ye ba~M dza ye/ dza yA/ bteng yab ti/ bau she Sha ba te/ bcom ldan 'das ma ga pa chen po tshad pan dang / phreng bamanga' nga byed rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mtshan no// 
137a6(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad rnam par skyong ba/ bdag la thams cad du kun nas bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ hu du hu ru/ pra ru mu dr-i/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpungag
137a7(rgyud): mi mchis pa/ bdag la bsrung dugasal/ bsrung du gsal/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar mdzad dugasapa// na \u0f7f/ na te/  Ne/ bo gab taM/ sarba du ra
137a8(rgyud): bing la/ ga ten/ du rung dra/ su ru su r+ra/ tsu ru chu/ ku du rba dra/ u pA la ni/ sung pa 'bram tha na/ sarba pagati tsU dzi te/  / d+hi d+hi / sa sa~M t+ta ma pa lo ki te/ pra b+he pra b+he/ sa pra b+he/ 
137b1(rgyud): / bi shud d+he/ san pA pa ba shad+d+ha ni/ d+hu ru d+ha / d+ha ne/  d+ha d+hang/ swa mras sa/ su mus suM su lu su mu su~M/ ru ru da / la na la la/ dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la gnad par sems pa las bskyab
137b2(rgyud): gsal/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ nga lags le/ na ljin/ pa dang / a Ta shaM/ ma lang+ga bi buM/ shod+ha ya sha d+ha ya/ shud d+he shud d+he/ b+ha b+har/ b+ha b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+ha ru/ ma gol
137b3(rgyud): bud d+he/ pa bi tra mu khe/ khar+the ni khaD+ge ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa le ta shi kha re/ sa man+ta a ba lo ke ta pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi shud d+he/ sa man+ta pra sA ri ta/ A bA ba si Tha shud d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba d+hi ba ga Na/ gra ha na k+Sha tra/

137b5(rgyud): du Ne/ sarba gra ha b+hak+Sha Ne/ bing ga le piM ga li/ mu tsu mu tsu/ tsu mu tsu mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu su be tsa re/ ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i blta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad duku
137b6(rgyud): sa phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcing pas bdag 'jig pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol// badz+ra dz+wa lA bi shud d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha saM shaM
137b7(rgyud): k+She sa ma pU ra Ni/ dral dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la/ dz+wa le ni/ skya'i chus kun du char dbab du gsol// a mr-i ta b.rA Ni da ba ta/ a ba tAng Na/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi mchog gi sgra dang ldan pa
137b8(rgyud): bdag la dbang bskur du gsol// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / bgyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkram shis pa dang / sreg pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ gnid sbyin dang / 
138a1(rgyud): / bran dang / thathams cad 'jams pa/ gad pas / wAg pa/ bdag 'dag sa sa spyang du/ gnod pa mas cad da gan / sems cad dug na thams ca smra
138a2(rgyud): thams cad du rtag par bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsal/ bal ba la/ ba lab te/ nga yang ya/ bi dza ya/ ba~M dza la/ thams cad du dus kun du bdag rgyal bar mngad du gas la/ bdag la rig pa
138a3(rgyud): / chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol/ dkyil 'khor chen po pad+ma bdu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams bsgrub tu gsol// bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza yaM/ sid d+ha sid d+yA/ pra d+ha bud+d+ha/ 
138a4(rgyud): swa tsa ya swa tsa ya/ pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs pa'i mdzad du gsal/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i b+hu tsan/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma pa
138a5(rgyud): dadag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyad du gsoso// 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/ sa ra sa pa/ pra sa
138a6(rgyud): sA ra/ sarba A ba ra NA bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta A ka ra man+ta la ba shud d+he/ bi ga te be kau ti/ bi ga ta ma le/ san ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ k+Shi Nik+She Ni/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ mal big ti/ dza la ba ti/ 
138a7(rgyud): ngob te/ brda brngub te/ 'jig tan gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa 'i swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis skye bo nas dbang bskung ba la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dang
138a8(rgyud): bslang ba la swA dz+dza/ sku thams cad kyis dbang bsgyung ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis da cig thub pas
138b1(rgyud): na/ dbang po dang ldan pa dang bas rnam par bltas pa la swAH/ tshangs padang tshangs pa gnas pa la swA hU~M/ kyab 'dugags phyag byas pa la swA / dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'cha bzhid mchod pa
138b2(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ migo me bzang la swA hA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ 
138b3(rgyud): rgyal ba chen po bzhes phyag byas pa la swA t+ma/ gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin rje'i mchod cing phyeg byas pa las te/ chu lta la swA / rlung kyi lus d+ha/ rnying rgya chen po la swA hA/ me wA la swA hA/ klus rnamapa
138b4(rgyud): bltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ bu'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gshin rje tsho zhes rnams la swA hA/ srin pa'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ 
138b5(rgyud): tshogs rnams ye swAhA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi bem ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lte ba phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swAn/ 
138b6(rgyud): rnams la swA hA/ sbyi ma yin rnams sa swA hA/ gdon thams cad la swA hA/ bzung ba thams cad pa swA d+h+we/ yi dgas la swAH/ zal swA te/ brjid byed la swA d+ha/ gnon byed la prA d+ha/ 
138b7(rgyud): tham la swA tre/ oMng+kuR+sha d+hu drA s+thA hA/ Nu s+yA swA hA/ sar ma du swAd+d+ha/ hani tan sa rba sha d+hA swA nA~M/ data da ta sarba duSh+TA nA b+hUd+ha/ pa tsa ba cas na praHd+hek+Shapa t+ye me dz+nyAswA tA/ gang dag pa / 
138b8(rgyud): la ma len par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dra la yas ng+ge mr-i swA hA/ 'bar ba las te/ rab tu'abang bal bA d+ha/ rdo rjesab pa la swA twa~M/ me lce ba ba la hA/ 
139a1(rgyud): / 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang la swA hA/ gang ba bzang ba la swA hA/ nag pa chen pa la swA hA/ mamamachags laswA hA/ gnad sbyin mo rnams la swA hA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams
139a2(rgyud): hA/ mtshan gnas parnamapa sa AH/ chen mdu rnams las te/  mal la A// dusagasu du n+yab rnams la san/ dras ma yin par rgyu rnams la swA hA/ bas su sangs pa
139a3(rgyud): la swA hA/ mang sa 'dzin la swA hA/ hu lu hU lu swA hA/ oM swA hA/ swaHAhA/ b+hu swAhA/ b+ha ba swaSh+Ta/ b+ha b+hu bswA hA/ tsa Ti tsi tsi Ni swAhA/ bai Ti babi swAhA/ d+hA ra~M NI swA hA/ d+ha ra ni swa hA/ ak+Shi swA hA/ 
139a4(rgyud): praswA hA/ tsi li tsi li sA hA/ me li mi la~M swA hA/ sa li sa la swAt+ma/ bud+ha prad+d+hA swA hA/ sid+d+ha sad+d+hi swA hA/ man+t+ra la ban d+he swA hA/ sI mA ban d+he swAt+ma/ d+ha ra NI b+han d+he swA hA/ sarba shad+d+he tAM b+hany+dza ya swA hA/ dza
139a5(rgyud): yA dam+b+ha ya swA hA/ stam+b+ha ya s+t+wam+b+ha ya swA hA/ tsA ts+tshin+da sA hA/ ts+tshin+de Sh+T+rIn+da nA~M hA/ b+h+yany+dzab+h+yan+d+ramA~MH/ ban+d+ha ban+d+haswA hA/ mo ha ya mo ta ya swA tA/ ma Ni bi shud d+he swA hA/ sur+ye swA hA/ swats+tsha ba~M shud d+he swA/ 
139a6(rgyud): deseM ng+ge/ ba shri mi/  n+te pa'i mU raNaShits+tshi n+na Sh+Ta/ bteHAH/ ma g+h+na swe d+he/ shi bo ts+tshinatAM/ shAn+ti b+h+yaHA tra/ pu r+dz+dza swA hA/ swam+b+ha yan g+hu swAtraM/ shaM bi ka riswAhA/ 
139a7(rgyud): swAt+ma/ shAn+ti kar swAH/ puSh+Ti ka ra swA hA/ bal banA~M ni ka sa/ shA AH/ shrI baN+Din rmA ts+tshi ng+ge / mr-i At+ta/ na mu \u0f7f/ ma / 'og g-i swA t+ma/ oM bcom ldan
139a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri mi dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad dugs lo// bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ oM mu ne mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ d+ha ri tsa la tsa
139b1(rgyud): nau/ b+ha na ba tau/ g+hu ya~M thig to// b+ha ya~M ha~M // dza~M d+haH d+hi/ khaM d+ha ya ba d+ha ya~M/ br-id d+hi ma bud d+hi/ saHtad+h+r-ig ga rjo la A hA/ oM mu~M ni bran mr-i ni ba // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan tha
139b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje go ma chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur dugs sa/ sarba ta thA ga ti hr-id ya/ Ad+hiT+TA ta badz+ra swA hA/ bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba che
139b3(rgyud): mo// kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di dag kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad
139b4(rgyud): las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// bram pa chen po rig pa 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so// ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser ska'i
139b5(rgyud): gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i che shA kya'i bu mos 'tshom bdag nyid mo'i nang du mchongs pa dang / de pad+ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gdon du sgrag can zin bzang po mngal nag
139b6(rgyud): na du rig pa 'di yid la byas so// rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di
139b7(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bram ze chen po rgyu des na mes mi tshig go// dug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus so// de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe
139b8(rgyud): chen po bde bar pa rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smrab gyur to// deb rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog pa bkug go// bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis sa
140a1(rgyud): bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myo nas ji ltar yang bdag na srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so// de nas smra ba can mang po pos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug
140a2(rgyud): las gso bar ma rgyas so// denas grong khyer chen po de ba rol tu 'a na ga pasnyen ma drim med pa dag bas ba chen po dang ldan pazhig gnas pa des dag pa'i rgyal mtshan mo nga
140a3(rgyud): du shes so// de de'i gnas su song te phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do// des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de drug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las
140a4(rgyud): yongs su thar bar byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ci ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du chongs dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas/ bram ze chen po gzhan yang ci ltar yongs su shes na/ rgyal po
140a5(rgyud): tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po blang rje sin sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i cha/ de'i shar phyogs kyi 'tshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan
140a6(rgyud): bzhi pago bskon te/ grong khyer chen po bA ra NA si kun nas bskor te/ gzhom par bshams so// de na pa rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis krong khyer
140a7(rgyud): 'phrog la thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par brtsi/ bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa nga rgyal pos khyed 'cha grib chung ngur gyis shig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang bachen
140a8(rgyud): mo zhes bya ba yod do// ngas des ngayung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o// la ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgre ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de rgyal po chen po sngon bdag cag gis nam yang ma
140b1(rgyud): thob pa 'di minag lags shes smras pa dang / rgyal pos ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes baba'o// denas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nus rig pa
140b2(rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi sgra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te/ g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pur dpung gi tshogs yang
140b3(rgyud): lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'das chang bcad nas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo // bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo che
140b4(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gsheg
140b5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe zung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur blta'o// 
140b6(rgyud): rten mo gang la la zhig rigi pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pabam/ mgul du btags na de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o// 
140b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs
140b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o// de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bang ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de mi shig pa'i gotsho can du rig par bya'o// de dgra 'ams cad
141a1(rgyud): / tu 'jams pa ga par bya'o// dasgrub pa dang sdug pa thams cad 'dams par rig par bya'o// dasems can dmyal ba'i 'gro 'arnams skyong bar rig par bya'o/  myu byer nad/ sngon yongs su shes
141a2(rgyud): pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan nagan dge slong me dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslabs pa 'dral po// ma byin pa len par/ bza' ba 'dra ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs
141a3(rgyud): bzhi dang / tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zag gar byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig dus gzhan zhig na nad tshab chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo // nyon mongs te
141a4(rgyud): med dpang gnyen med nas ku cotso'i sgra chen po 'byin to// bram ze chen po nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des spya de thos so// thos nas kyang dge sbyong gal ba der song ste phyin sa 'azhi pa'i rgyal ma
141a5(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te/ dge slong de'i mgul du btags so// rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab du zhi/ nad thams cad las ni
141a6(rgyud): yongs su thar to// sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan ma zad pa dang / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// lus de bor ba dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de
141a7(rgyud): rori yang dge slong dag gis skang bu zhig la bzhag go// rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so// dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can
141a8(rgyud): 'i sems can de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to// mtshams med pa'i me phung po chen
141b1(rgyud): po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i mde dag thams cad ngo mtshar sbas nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshigs 'di dag rgyas par brjod do// sems
141b2(rgyud): las skyes pa yi// sdug bsngal mi bzang rab tu ni// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha// sems dmyal nyam rnams na gda'// lus can lus la rtag gnas pa'i// mem mur de rab tu ni// sog le rnams kyis
141b3(rgyud): / gsheg ma mchis// spu gri'i sos yang gcod mi bgyid// lcags sdong shal ma re yang chag// lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi// ral gri lo ma can nags na// las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal
141b4(rgyud): po gshin rje khyod// mi rnams la ni chos kyi ston// rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la// khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs// de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can// chos des chos kyi rgyal po ngas// snying rje'i bsam pa
141b5(rgyud): / nyams rnams kyi// 'di dra'i tshigs de thos gyur nas// myur du 'di ni ci yi ni spros// 'di ni ci 'dra yang smros shig/ de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi// gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la// 
141b6(rgyud): / 'di skad kyi ni tshigs smras so// mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar// sems can chen po 'di skyes lha// gang gis ming ni mnar med pa// des na de ni nyam ngar brjod// gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa
141b7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs// 'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas// skar yang lha'i gnas su mchis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang // mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni// 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 
141b8(rgyud): 'di ni tshe rabs snga lus tshe// ci ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas// de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes// de na pa sems can
142a1(rgyud): // dmyal ba'i bsrung ma gnod ldan dgags chos kyi rgyal po gshin rdul 'di skad ces smras so// lha rdo lta ngan man po sor 'brang yin pa bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gachags rnams
142a2(rgyud): so sor dran// de ni ma 'akrung 'gro ma 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba bsgom pa yi// shes ra can / mas can dmyal ba'i spyang sa ma byed// rab tu rgyas dang ldan pa de // de ni rlung
142a3(rgyud): la// lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan pa dong ngo // de tshe de ma
142a4(rgyud): sa// rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/ skang bu de yi khong zug na/ 'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong / ma zhig gis mgul pa na/ so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang 'thod / lha dang klu dang drib dang / 
142a5(rgyud): de bra pom 'am / brtan pa 'byu ba nganas// bla med pa'i mchod pa skyed/ de sa gnod sbyi ga nas/ se sor 'azung yin shes btakus// de nas gnod ldan de dag gi 'a chos kyi
142a6(rgyud): shin rje'i nges pa de rton slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par brjod do// de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshigs de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems
142a7(rgyud): can dmyal ba'i lus dab nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// rtswa nges na sngon mo song 'brang ba'i lha'i bri zhes bya'o// bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongs su shes so// 
142a8(rgyud): sosor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o// yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag du sdug bsngal zhing nyams
142b1(rgyud): mas cad las yongs su thang bar 'gyur/ ngan na 'angags skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so// blan zhes ci ltar mi nus zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon yongs su/ 
142b2(rgyud): skyes te/ grong khyer chen po chog shede kun rnguban/ tshong dpon chen po dri mad dung zhes bya ba nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdod dang / bang ba kun gang ni phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bye bar grags/ 
142b3(rgyud): / de nas ded dpon chen po dgra bo che de rnyed nas/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya mde rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/ rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te/ 'brug sgra chen po sgrog
142b4(rgyud): nga skar mda' yang gtong ngo // rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa yang ba shams so// de nas tshang ba de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po dadang / glog dang skar mad dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bibs pa dang / 
142b5(rgyud): da de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to// de nas de dag chos
142b6(rgyud): sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas de dag gagis snying rje rje skad du chags 'di skad smras so// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag skyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar mdzad dugs la// de nas
142b7(rgyud): dpon chen po sems brtan pa zlo gros chen po dem tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshigs 'di skad smras so// ma 'jigs mi 'jigs tshong pa rnams// khyed cag brtan par deng shika dang // khye
142b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal chen po yi// rgya mtsho cha las ngas bsgral lo// de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas// tshong pa rnams kyis cheg 'di smral// sems can chen po 'di ci lags// bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cag
143a1(rgyud): / chen ba khyod kyi mthus/ bdag cag srid 'chaba'/ ye shas mas bdag nyid gsungs// spyang na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ de nas 'dron mang bdan po las/ de dag la na tshig 'did brjod/ 
143a2(rgyud): zung ba ste/  yin pa thags pa yod// rgod byed mas sa par byed/ sa na na / pa na gapa la ba/ jigs pa mangs bskus 'o// dem 'a
143a3(rgyud): chen po de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / reg pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen me rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya med de dag thams cad
143a4(rgyud): lo che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo // de nas su de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so// ka mdi de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal sa 'bang ba chen mo 'di nyi
143a5(rgyud): pazlas che gnas byerd te zhi bar gyur to// 'dron po phal po che de dag kyang gru chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par byas so// de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mos sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de/ 
143a6(rgyud): / zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so// 'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcang bar bya'o// rlung dang / grang ba dang
143a7(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu ni ba byed do// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / brjod pa las yongs su thar bar byed do// sbrang bumachu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / 
143a8(rgyud): be dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad mthu med cing cha du zhi bar 'gyu'o// ri dgas dang / bya dang / ga can gzan gnod par sems pa thams/ 
143b1(rgyud): pa gdu tin da sa dan ma nanas dang/  ma ba ts+tshaha~M/ ra na shi dang / bam pa / 
143b2(rgyud): yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ha nang char che ba dang / char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo // char dus su 'bab cing / dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// yul de'i klu chen po gang
143b3(rgyud): de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so// yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di skyed pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya te/ spos sna tsho
143b4(rgyud): dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas klu dbyangs dang / rol mo sa la snyan byas te/ 
143b5(rgyud): byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gis bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du de/ 
143b6(rgyud): lta bur 'grub ste/ bu po 'dod na'ang khye'u 'grub/ mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/ mngal na bde bar skye ba dang / mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur/ mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang / dus bzhin ra
143b7(rgyud): btsam par 'gyur/ ces mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig/ yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na/ rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to// ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rkyal
143b8(rgyud): bcas ma thag du lag pa brgyad nas ma'i nu nol bzung ste/ nu no ngams ngoms su 'thung mo// num de gnyis la rem ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to// dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur to// rga das
144a1(rgyud): / rgyal po lag brgyad zhes bya bar btags par gyur to// gzhan yang gang ga tshe rgyal po'i gan du skya ba slongs mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po nga
144a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pal lnga rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do// rgyal po des kyang skye ba spangs
144a3(rgyud): pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no// bsams pa tsam gyis spangs mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin no// bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang / 
144a4(rgyud): bsti stang cher byas kyang bu pho ma rnyed nas de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar brtsams te mchod pa dang / bsti stang chen po byaso// sbyin pa yang byir ro// 
144a5(rgyud): bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so// bsod nams chen po byas so// sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na/ kyang yul zhes bya
144a6(rgyud): ba'i grong khyer ku sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na bcom ldan 'das rin tshon mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos la sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa
144a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas rig pa chen po so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po
144a8(rgyud): de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu grub kyi'o// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gi ba cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i che bdag / chos la mchod pa brgyad do// zhes smras nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing
144b1(rgyud): sa kyang lda to// da ba gnan gan/ dem ni des pani gcig na bdag des sems can thams cad ma phra rgya chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong/ 
144b2(rgyud): byas nas rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'di bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de dag kyang btab bo// 
144b3(rgyud): rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to// de ltung bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te/ lha rnams cangad mchod panas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / 
144b4(rgyud): de'i tshe gnas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyise mis sus su bstan te/ bdiskad du/ kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnab par dag pas rgyas pa
144b5(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor du phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mchog las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin bris la btsun mo dam pa sbyang ba byas la cho ga bzhin du

144b7(rgyud): sa cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo nga ba lus shin tu legs par bkrus te/  bya b+has nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di yang cho ga bzhin
144b8(rgyud): gis skye btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so// sangs rgyas kyis chod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so// ba po mi khyad par can du ma yang sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin du/ 
145a1(rgyud): nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu bo gzugs pabangag mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa// bdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhag bcas sa// bram ze chen po de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal
145a2(rgyud): chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi
145a3(rgyud): nor bu yin no// gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang / g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lha ma yin thams cad pham
145a4(rgyud): byas/ pha rol pham par byas nas dpe ba dang / bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug te/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no// bram ze chen po de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa nas
145a5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'di gang gi lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhi
145a6(rgyud): shegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / mi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang /

145a8(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsungs so// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la lam gyi nad dang / gnod
145b1(rgyud): thams cad dang / nad 'gab thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la sgra thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang / ste

145b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsang sngags kyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams grub pa'o// rkad ya nA/ oM a mr-i te a mr-i te ba re/ bar ba ra/ pra ba ra bi shud d+he/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ a a mr-i ta be lA ki ni gar+b+ha saM dak+Sha

145b6(rgyud): ru tsu le hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ri Ni ma hA pra te sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad / 
145b7(rgyud): bru gcig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs to// gsang sngags 'di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so song 'brang ba chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o// de bzhin gshes
145b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// 'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na yi ger bri ba dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa la ci smos te/ de nas sangs rgyas la bya
146a1(rgyud): / reg par bya'o// di na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so// de ma me ro// lung bstan to// so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dimachog tu dkar pa'o// 
146a2(rgyud): 'or 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i meng thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen mo 'di ni sdig pa thams cad kyang bar byed pa/ stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa/ gzi brjid che ba/ 'od che ba/ yon tan brjod par che ba

146a4(rgyud): skyong ba dang / 'khor bar bya ba dang / drag shul du spyod pa gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod

146b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog dang bcas pa bdud bye 'a khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgra mi snyan pa/ bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs
146b3(rgyud): par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'beb po// mngon par sprul nas lhags te/ phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya

146b6(rgyud): / gyon pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong du ma ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tsheg 'di skad du gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gnod par byed pa/ bdud gnod
146b7(rgyud): sems can rnams blangs sheg zungs shig/ chings shig chings shig/ gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig/ gnod sems can dang / gza' dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
146b8(rgyud): srog phye mar gyis shig ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong ngo // de nas bdud de dag thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btul nas/ la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas/ la las ni blam
147a1(rgyud): // med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o/ das chuche ba gzhan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsru'i bu gnas thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/ grong khyer tu
147a2(rgyud): khwa gong bar gyur/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams shing spobs pa dang / stobs dang rtsal med par gyur cing / mda' gzhu dag kyang cha gnas byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bgegs dang / lag 'dren da
147a3(rgyud): bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// brgal to pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal ma

147a5(rgyud): dang / 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed do// bram po chen po rgyu bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o// yi ger bris te rtag su lus la gdags shing
147a6(rgyud): bcang bar bya'o// ces mngon zhe na/ snga ma bzhin du nyon cig rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du me zhig la nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i ma
147a7(rgyud): rnams la khyed kyis mi 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mi re khrid de ri su la zhig du phyini nas/ ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad par bshams pa
147a8(rgyud): dang / de'i tshe mi des rig pa'i rgyal mo sa sa 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no// yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go// sems can chen por de 'og pa 'di'i mthus/ ral
147b1(rgyud): kr-i me lce gcig du byur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bur dum bur gyur to/ nas ga shed ma mi dag glengs pa 'ang rgyal po la zhib tu bskyed do// de nas rgyal po rab tu 'khrugs nas/ kye mi dgas phyogs zhig na gnod tu
147b2(rgyud): phuphrag yod de/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po sha rjen zab gnas kyis/ dang bred de bor cig ces bska'o// de nas me de gshed ma mi dge gas gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ro// gnod sbyin gyi phrug der bor ma thag tu de nas ga
147b3(rgyud): na de dag thams cad yang dga' ste/ mi sha bzar snyam du brgyugs pa dang / de dag gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro bar rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
147b4(rgyud): cad dngangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par yang mthong ngo // de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khridad sgo phyir rol du bzhag nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la
147b5(rgyud): tabasnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po cher 'khrugs te rngams nas gal te de ltar na khyed cag deng lam 'di chings te/ chung bor cig ces bsgo ba dang / gshed ma'i ma de dag gis khrid de chur bor ro// 
147b6(rgyud): chur bor la thag tu me de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhin du chu med par gyur to// chings ma de dag kyang du mabur du ma bur chad do// rgyal blo de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig tshugs su bltas
147b7(rgyud): e ma 'o mi ba ngo mtshar to// 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to// zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po des mi nges bkug ste/ kye mi khyod ci zhig shes zhes nga skad smras so// mi des smras
147b8(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rige pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las gzhan ni ci yang ma 'tshal te/ lha de ni de'i mthus lags so// rgyal pos smras pa ngo mtshar che'o// rin pa chen mo dag par gzung / 
148a1(rgyud): // bdag na tur mongs byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis 'grungs/ sems can thas cad la// na dang sdug bsngal thar bar byed// rig pa chen thog pa brjed pa// dus man 'chilas rab tu rnas
148a2(rgyud): nad chen rnams ni zlog byed pa// mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pa'i rgyal mchen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod do// mi de yang
148a3(rgyud): blon thabs byin te/ rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po rnyed do// sems
148a4(rgyud): nod sems can thams cad kyis kyang dgas pa ma bya'o// de ltar na ge pa rgyam mtshan mapang yangs su shes te gang du yang thogs pa med do// de lta bas na gdon me ma yang rtag tu lus la gdags shing bca
148a5(rgyud): bya'o// bram ze chen po skad ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
148a6(rgyud): zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di'i cho ga ni ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod nyon cig sems can kun la snying brtse
148a7(rgyud): // ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// gang gis sems can bde byed cing // nyam nga ba yi las las 'grol// nad rnams las kyang thar byed de// bud med sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dang
148a8(rgyud): bzhi// rtsa rnams gso bar bya phyir ro// bsnyen gnas dag la gnas gyur nas// rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed// snying rjes
148b1(rgyud): bdun sems dang // byams pa dang na // ga tusems can rnams cad // pan babyud pa brjod par bya// ban nga ni zurang bum dang // ma cing bsras pa'i rgyas bkrus te/ 
148b2(rgyud): rnams kyis bdug pa ye// gos gcang rnams ni bgo bar bya// sa dang rtsib bsres pa 'i// de 'i 'og tud dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba ban pazhag ste// snga ba kyil 'khor dbus bu gzhag/ de la ran ci
148b3(rgyud): chen po yi// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan dan smri ka de bzhin du// ma gdung ru ka/ sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i// bdug pa cho ga bzhin du 'bul// cho ga ci bzhin dus bzhin bya// lo tog rnam pa
148b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams// me tog 'bras bus bon dang // spos nas kun gyis legs par brgyan// mar dang sbrang ci 'o ma dang // nas thuga' thug la sogs pas// gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya// mtshan mang
148b5(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis pa// phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i bor pa rnams// grwa bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram log
148b6(rgyud): su// seng ldeng phung bu bzhi btsugs la// tshon skud kha dog sna lnga yis// 'khor bar dam du bri bar bya// gal te bdag 'grub 'dod na ni// bram ze de ltar byas nas bri// bzas dkar po zos nas su// phan par
148b7(rgyud): 'dod pas bri bar bya// dang ram ras sam gro ga 'am// ci yang rung ba gzhan la pre// bud med dag la bu 'dod na// ga'u tang gis ni legs par bri// dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas ni// rgyan dmas kun gyis rnam
148b8(rgyud): par brgyan// de ban ni rin cen gang ba'i nga/ lag pa g.yon na thog par bya// pad ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing // brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya// nong bu dro shalags rangag dang // ramatshan sna tshogs rnams
149a1(rgyud): // byas brgyad// gdul bar shin du da/ 'a ba bra// zla bzhadag tu rab kra// gas te bad pas/ tsho 'dod na// rab tu bsgrims tan lta br-i// bye brag tu na skyes pa rnams// gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya// 
149a2(rgyud): dgos pa 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// pad ma gnyis sam yang na gsum// bzhi 'am yang na lnga bres te// pad ma la na phyag rgya'i mtshan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bris// des
149a3(rgyud): pad ma rnams// be bas kun tu 'khor bar bri// pad ma 'dab ma rab rgyas la// sdong bu dang kyis bcings par bris// pad ma la ni rtse gsum pa// zur brgyad la ni dang dbyings bri// de bzhin padam dgra sta
149a4(rgyud): 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bri// pad ma bcas pas ral gri pre// pad ma don dkar ba bya// pad ma'i steng du dung yang bre// thams cad du yang rgyas par bya// kun du cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams// mkhas pa dag gis/ 
149a5(rgyud): / bar bya// gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba// byis pa'i gzugs rnams me bri'o// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// lha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya// dge slong phyer na rdo rje 'chang // gnod sbyin
149a6(rgyud): brtson par bri// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang // ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya// bram ze'i phyir na dbang ldan no// rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che// dmangs rigs phyar ni rtag zhi ba// khyab 'jug legs
149a7(rgyud): bri bar bya// rje'u rigs byer ni nam thos bu// lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bri// khye'u yi phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag/ blo gros chen po bri bar bya// skyo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa// de yi ched du khros pa bre// dka
149a8(rgyud): de grags ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs su bri// sbom ma'i phyi na nor bu bzang // rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang // rang 'byung nga yis bstan par bye// sbrum ma'i
149b1(rgyud): nag mo che// tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya// gnan yang ca ltar chag las// gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri// rtag tu mgul du btags na ni// de ni bde bar 'gyur
149b2(rgyud): ba yin// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad ma la// yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bre// pad ma'i snying por zhags pa dang // de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya// pad ma'i steng du rdo rje dang // pad ma'i snying po thob bre// cho ga las ni 'byung ba
149b3(rgyud): bzhin// pad ma'i steng du mdung thung bri// cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin// nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar// 'od zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang // dar gyis bcing pa bri bar bya// klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la// nor bu ra
149b4(rgyud): 'bar ba dang // de dag kun gyi snying gar yang // rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te pre// rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang // ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// reg pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bri// 
149b5(rgyud): zla ba nyim rgya skar bcas/ sgragacan mjug rangs gza' brgyad bri// chog bzhin du de bres pa// the gros ldan pa'i mang bsrel na// zam dang nim nang yang // bu po rnyed par 'gyur ba yin// 'don thams cad 'grub
149b6(rgyud): par byed// shes shing sdig pa zhi bar byed// rang 'byung gi ni bka' bzhin du// gnas kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na 'ang mchog tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// sum cu rtsa gsum
149b7(rgyud): gnas la sogs// lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur// 'jam gling bab dang nyams dga' bar// khyad par rje rigs grags pa dang // rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang // bram ze khyad par 'phags rnams su// 
149b8(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po de skyes te// rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba 'chang ba'i me sa// bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi// bsod nams phung po brjod me nus// sems ca
150a1(rgyud): // dmyal ba'i rnams pad// mab na rnams ba bya// bdang can sum chags pa dang / thagras can pa byas yin// sas rgyas bya chubasams dpas kyang // gtud dug son phyin papar gyur// 
150a2(rgyud): lus kyi 'de bzan sum tshogs// stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba men// rgyal bas pan/ dgasungs pa lturang // gsongs sbyar bar 'thur ba yin// med // rnams dbunas 'byin te// gnod par sems la skrag par
150a3(rgyud): byed// ga byer rig pa legs bshad pa// de ni ring sor ma thogs so// de ni mtshon gyis mi rgyags te// dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang // de las thag ni ring gu gro/ 
150a4(rgyud): du nyan pa 'am// mthong ba dang ni rig pa'ang rung // 'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang // chu dang me yi 'jigs pa dang // gcan gzan sprul dang sengag dang // klu dang nad ni mi bzad rnams// gang la reg pa legs bshadapa// 
150a5(rgyud): de la de dag kun mi 'byung // de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur// bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du// mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te// yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par byos// rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'dra
150a6(rgyud): ba chen mo chog rdzogs so// // de nas sems can thams cad la skyed brtse ba'i phyir rigs sngags 'chang ba bsrung ba'i tshul gyi chog bshad pa bya'o// bsrung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis// dngos gru chen po
150a7(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur ba// gang dang gang du bsrung byas na// don yod 'gyur te the tshom med// 'jigs med rims kyis mi btab ste// gza' rnams thams cad zlog par byed// rgyu skar rnams kyang 'thun par
150a8(rgyud): las kyi lu ku rgyud kyang gcod// gza' nyes pa dang sgom nyes dang // dgra tshogs kun gyis byas pa dang // gnod par lus dang pra nyes dang // byad dang gang yang mi bzang dang // phye ma sngags kyis btab pa dang // dug
150b1(rgyud): thung ba dang sbyar ba'i drug/ gang zhig bsrung ba 'chang del// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// gang nag rig las 'gal byed pa// yan lag rnams la rnam par smin// so sor 'brang ba 'ad mod pasngags na// pha rol 'khor/ 
150b2(rgyud): demi bzad dang // 'dzags pa chen po dgra ye rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' nges pas bsrung // nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang / rang sa sa
150b3(rgyud): bsrung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi// lha klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// 'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa// de la bsrung ba byed par 'gyur// rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di// thos pa tsam gyis me mchog rnams
150b4(rgyud): kun tu 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes// thub pa yis ni de skad gsungs// rmi lam ngan dang ngan byas dang // gang yang nad 'go mi bzad dang // nad kyis btab dang nad chen gyis// gang dag zin cing khrag smug dang // gzhan yang
150b5(rgyud): dam pa mang po'i nad// 'bras dang shu ba skem po dang // gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas// me yi skye dgu zin pa dang // mi rnams ma rung bya ba'i phyir// mchog tu mi bzad gnod byed rnams// bsrung ba stobs chen
150b6(rgyud): // de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di las bsrung ba byas nas ni// bcings pa dag kyang grol bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang // gal te dus kyi zhags pa yis// bzung nas gshin rje'i ga
150b7(rgyud): srid pa// de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel// gang zhig tsho na bad gyur tam// zhag bdun na mer che 'gyur ba// yi ge bris pa'i bar tsam gyis// 'tsho bar 'gyur te the tshom med// cho ga bzhin du bsrung byas pa 'am/ 
150b8(rgyud): thos pa tsam gyis kyang // kun tu dge ba thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tshe// gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha// stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang // bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang // brgya byed bang
151a1(rgyud): // gro kun// sems cad de la bsrung ba byar// bya ba zhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed// 'dzag tan stong pa can 'ong ga/ lag na rdo rje ma chen yang // rig pa'i rig pa ni brgya dag nga // lhan cig rtag tu
151a2(rgyud): spang bar byed// zlab ya nga nyis dang // tshangs pa kya 'jug dpang zug ce// na su ya dngag shid nga/ slobs kyi rnaM masarjen dang// ga pabang pod pas che dang / 'ardzogs bla pa sa pa ma
151a3(rgyud): dang rdzas can dang // sprin drug khudang tshogs dang dang // lha mo chen mo dpal can dang / rnam thos bu dang byangs pa dang // dung ban me tog so// de bzhidi ral pa gcig pa dang // gnod myi cher po dpal yod car
151a4(rgyud): tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// za ma rnams kyi bu yang skyed// mngal na gnas pa bde bar byed// de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar// 'di ni bsrung ba chen por 'gyur// 'jigs med 'thab ma'i g.yul 'gyed par// dpa'
151a5(rgyud): rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin// chos la nges pa'i lha rnams lo// 'ad snang bar ston par byed// sdig pa rnam par gnog pa'i phyir// gus par byed de bris na no// de ba dir gshegs dang bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa
151a6(rgyud): 'ang blta bar 'gyur// de la grags pa rnam par 'phel// bsod nams dang ni cha yang 'phel// nor rnams dang ni 'bru dag kyang // 'byor par 'akur te the chos med// bde bdag nyid kyis log pa dang // bde 'ar rab tus
151a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'thung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra kun gyis kyang mi brdzi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa yi chan yang // dag pa sla pa byas na ne// bzung ba blanamed pa 'dis// rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed/ 
151a8(rgyud): bde bar rig pa sgrub byed cing // de la 'gegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur// da yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yi// skye ba dag ni thams cad du// de ni myur du dam tshig shes// rgyal ba'i yan/ 
151b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa ro// den ma sa na ma yin no// bkra shas thams cad pa tu rdzogs// khamam thams cad thub par byed/ 'din thos pa tsam gyi kyang / khang pa thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nam
151b2(rgyud): ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab pa dang ni bcod pa dang // 'gyed pa mchog tu mi bzang par// 'jigs pa kun las grol 'gyur te// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin no// skye ba rnams su skye ba na// rtag tu skye dran the tshom med// 
151b3(rgyud): rgyal po btsur mo 'khor bcas pa// 'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yi ni// 'jig rten dge bar grags pa yin// rtag tu thun mongs 'gyur ba yin// de ni kun la sdug par 'gyur// lha dang ma ni gang yang rung // nyin dang mtsha
151b4(rgyud): rnams rtag par yang // de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub po// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la bya
151b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
151b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir// del gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// da na nga yis brjod par bya// rig pa gzi brjid chen po 'di// stobs chen pa robs
151b7(rgyud): ba ste// rdo rje gdan la thugs pa yis// 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // bdud dang bdud kyi ris rnams dang // gza' dang log par 'dren pa dang // bgegs rnams je sad gang yod pa// thams cad de yi med la byed// dad
151b8(rgyud): / gi ri Ni ga ri Ni/ gI ri pa ti/ grA NA pA ti/ a kA sha ba ta/ a kA sha bi shud+d+he/ sarba pra pa pi ga te/ A kA she/ ga gan ha le/ a kA sha bi tsA ri Ni dza li dang ge kha re/ ma Ni mu k+Shi ka/ kha tsa mo li d+ha re/ 
152a1(rgyud): / bi shes / b+h+ya/ sag /  na/  nam ldan gnasas na/ bad+hAn dzam// ngas / 9/  // gas// sa ga sa / mArbaH/ 
152a2(rgyud): yan/ gdon pa rungs pa rnams kyis srog gnom dugasol// bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi sreg pa thams cad gzhin dugs 'o// gzhan du na la/ rnams ci sasuM pa du / gnod sa chu
152a3(rgyud): yo ki ne/ badz+re/ ba shu/ pA sha/ mung+ga ra// baR+sha/ she/ ga tsakra tre shwa la/ tsan dA pa Ni/ ma
152b1(rgyud): cad da gnas par dus pa thams cad dang / ma dang ma ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / la dgas pamams cad mas bsrung dugasal bsrung dug sog/ padre 'jo badrab te/ barbab NI d+he/ hi li hi le/ 
152b2(rgyud): mel pa le/ ka la kar/ tsa mi tsa la/ pa la le/ sims 'i/ b.rab / ba da/ sang na/ dasal brjes hA/ mtha' ba 'i dzin d+ha/ sarba/ sarbar+b+ba hrI AH/ sarbarba/ sarbe sha h+ye ba ya ta ra Ne swAH/ sar+b+ba b+ha/ 
152b3(rgyud): swAsA hA/ sarba b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ swasti ra b+ha ba du ma na swA hA/ shAn+ti ka ri swA hA/ puSh+Ti ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar d+ha ri Ni swA hA/ dza ya tu/ dza li dza yau/ dza ya b+ha ti/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ bi bu le swA hA/ sarba ta thA ka ta pu ri te swA hA/ oM brU
152b4(rgyud): mahA shI ti swA hA/ a rbu b+hu ri/ badz+ra ba taM/ sarbatwa thA ga ta da la/ bur Na/ a mraHsan d+ha da Ni/ bal ba la/ bal ba te/ dza ya'i / ts+tshad+d+he/ phaT phaT swAH/ bram ze chen po gang la la zhig gis de ban gshegs pa'i sku
152b5(rgyud): rashes pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su bsrung bar byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / ngani pa dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / dbyug pa spang ba dang / 
152b6(rgyud): mtshen cha snang ba byas na/ de tshe yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te ri du bde bar 'che bar 'gyur ro// dran pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// bskrad pa tsam dang / rdo rje byabs pa tsam gyis dus ma
152b7(rgyud): ba dang / nad ched po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i na thams cad kyang rab tu ni par 'gyur ro// rgyun ring dun pal yang byangs pa tsam gyis rab tan par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin da kha tor du
152b8(rgyud): na por 'gyu'o// ga dzi dang / gams da tsan /  na na ma do ldan padams kyi skal ga ma kyi
153a1(rgyud): 'byu nga/ sangs rgyas da kyang na bsams da 'das sa dang / klu dag gan kun la sogs bya thams cad kyang da sus can da dang / stobs dag na ma ldan
153a2(rgyud): dka' ba chen po mang bar 'gyur ro// bram ze chen po phan rag pa chen mo gsang sngags kyi gangan 'ad dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya'i rnalam du thos na yang de dag thams cad bAn med pa yang dag
153a3(rgyud): gas pa'i byang chub las byar me ldog par 'gyur na/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dam/ dge ba
153a4(rgyud): 'am/ rgyal po 'ab/ rgyal po'i blon po'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ de las gzhan pa 'ga' zhig gis/ lan ma car los te/ thos nas kyang dad pa chen po dang / gus pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yi
153a5(rgyud): ra'adring ma/ yig gar 'drir 'jug gas/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid drag pos sgom pa 'am/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu smon pa lA ci smos te/ bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par
153a6(rgyud): 'chi ba btud rnam pa thams cad du krung du ma dogs shig/ de'i lus la nang chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug sbyar mas ma ler/ 
153a7(rgyud): dkyis ma yin/ g.yengs byed kyis ma len/ sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/ phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ yan lagan par mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btab par mi 'gyur/ klad par ba dang / kon gcig pa
153a8(rgyud): na gnyis pa dang / nya re gsum pa dang / nyin lan pa dang / nyir bdun pa dang rims rams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dran bzhin du bde bar gnyid log cing dran ba zhin du bde ba sad par 'grur
153b1(rgyud): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mang 'thob par 'gyur // mnan gyig gis chos dang ldan pa dang zlan can bzab par 'gyur // dag nga shang dun pa'i skye ba dang der skye badran par 'gyur ro// sems pa sems// 
153b2(rgyud): cad kyang byams par 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i rgyu gnas kyi 'gro ba thabs po kun dang / yi dwags su skye ba rnams las yongs su thang bar 'gyur ro// ngi mA
153b3(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de ba zhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// ji 'ur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i ma nus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa

153b7(rgyud): / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'i 'byung ngo // dgra'i chog pa thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// tha na bas dpa dzes pa zhig la gshed
153b8(rgyud): ma'i mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par ga'as ra yang mtshon rnams rdul bzhin du ma bu dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// de dag nyid kyi dus na de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de'i dran pa'i stobs kyang chang 'gyuro//

154a2(rgyud): rmilam bzang po mi bar byed// rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig/ rig pa mthus pas chen mo 'di// skyes pa bung mad bsrung ba'i mchog/ 'grog dgon dang ni mya ngan las// rtag tu de yi yod la thar// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
