217a6(rgyud): mkhar 'gro dang gser 'gyur dang // de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod// rmongs dang rengs dang bskrad pa dang / dbye dang dgug dang rig sngags 'ching // bsrung dang phyir bzlog chen po
217a7(rgyud): ka dang lkug dang sems brgyal dang // long dang sna tshogs nad skyed pa'i// spyor ba rgya chen 'grub pa dang // mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po thob 'aku
217a8(rgyud): mthong tsam la sogs pa yi// dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos// sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha// dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa yi// hUM las skyes pa'i lha mo ni// sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug
217b1(rgyud): g.yas pa ser shing g.yon pa dam pa// spyan gsum spang mig khro ga nyer can// dmar ser gyen gcod pas brgyan// dus pa'i rgyun gyis spras shing 'gyi / zod pa'i phreng can klu yis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brgya
217b2(rgyud): bskum ro langs pa dzis// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang pon// rdo rje gnyis pas gri gug ste// gsum pas sbrul gyi zhugs pa'idzin// g.yon gyi dang po sregs mdzub ste// gagos pas thod pa gsum pa na// klul
217b3(rgyud): pa dkar po'o// yang na zhal kun sdebs pa nyid// 'di ni 'ching dang dbang gi las// mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa'o// srid par bram ze skyes lha mo// sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// phyag g.yas rdo rje ga po
217b4(rgyud): sngo// gcer du rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa// bsad pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// dorjernal 'byor ma 'dis bsgrub// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ chos rnams thams cad 'byung byed cing // dngos grub mA du bskyed pa yis// 
217b5(rgyud): katsu 'brung zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la skoms zhugs nas// yan lag phyag rgya bka' stsal pa// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas shing // slar la khu tshur bcang byas te// rgyab ga zhes smad nas 'jub lo dra / ma
217b6(rgyud): lcags sgrog bcing byas te// kha yi thad kar bzhag das na// rig pa'i phreng ba brjod pa yi// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par byed// phyag rgya bcings nas gsang sngags ni// rjes su dran par byas tsam gyi// lam du
217b7(rgyud): 'gro yang bde bar thar// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu chud ma yi rgyud kyi rig sngags las lha dang phyag rgya/ tan la dbang pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad
217b8(rgyud): sa kyi sbyor ba bla na med/ mtshungs pa'i tshogs kun 'grub byed pa// rdo mkha' 'gra ma yis zhen/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi e.u du la~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a Ni She ga ta ma ma ya shrI ye hUM/ dbang bsrung ba
218a1(rgyud): // ni bla na med// ji ma'i tshogs rnams dag byed cing / phre sde shes tshogs byas nag/ rig pa'i chum po thob par byed/  tsan mo badz+ra buM rjes / t+t+ya rna ba gan ma
218a2(rgyud): oM k+Shi d+h+we sa ka la/ ga na bi na ba re/ sh+ya r+yas pa ri wA ra a a a/ a b+hi te ra d+hi/ a b+ha ta ra s+ye a D+ha ta ran d+ha/ sarbad sha di ka/ lo ka pA la/ lo ka pA li/ i ma pa li gr-ihA tu/ hr-i da ni dri bi ban+du hU~M pharba/ 
218a3(rgyud): te/ l+le l+le badz+ra d+ha ra ya/ a dI pa ya ti swA hA/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// tha dad rtog pa spong bar byed// mchod pa dang de gtor ma yis// bar tu gcod pa kun sel byed yi DA ya badz+ra swA b+hA
218a4(rgyud): / sku gsung thug kyi ngo rje yis// rnam par smras pa'i mtshan ma la// mtshan ma med pa rnam gnas pa// shes nas mtshan nyid rnam par dag oM sarba tathA ga tA d+hA na badz+ras b+ha ba At+ma kaiTI haM/ gang
218a5(rgyud): ga dbang po yul mtshan pa// mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnam shes dang // ye shes nyid ni mngon sum du// skye ba nyid la the tsam med// de nas rgya chen sbyor ba'i gno// 'khor lo'i cho ga bshad par bya// klog
218a6(rgyud): shun la// gur kum gi'u wang tsan dan bcas// pu ka ser pos 'khor lo ni/ rtsibs bcu pad+ma'i steng du pra mtha' nas me'i phreng bas bskor// pad ma'i 'dab ma bcu la ni// phyogs bcu kun du bcing ba yi// 
218a7(rgyud): sogs bcu po bre/ de yi rgya du phyogs bcu rnams/ bcing ba'i sngags ni rib bzhin bri// 'khor lo'i tsho bas rnams bcu po la// d+h+r-i nyis bar du 'asrub phyi'i ming // bsrung ba dang bcas bri bar bya/ phyogs bzhir sngags dang phyag
218a8(rgyud): 'phrul lab gcod dang 'tshong ba dang / 'jug pa'i sngags sub cas pabri/ gzhan yang mtsham sa rnams drun po ni/ da klu dang lha min dang / gnod gyen grul bum la sogs pa/  zeng badrug po thob bya/ lte ba
218b1(rgyud): lusas ma ma thul// gang 'da'i gnas su gdags par bya/  nin la 'byor bsrung dron du// de sbya sum pa kun 'grub ste// 'gas pa rgyan po med par byed// den pa gzhan yang rgyal po'i ngas// gsaral cang
218b2(rgyud): gapung dang / dri zhim rnams kyis byas nas ni// rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la// gur kum gyis ni 'khor lo bri// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i// phyi rol mu khyud gsum ldan pa'i// pad ma'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i gza
218b3(rgyud): phan lag rdo rjes mtshan pa dri// de la snying po'i sngags kyis bskor// de rjes lte ba'i mu khyud la// steng 'og bcing pa'i sngags kyis bri/ phyogs mtshams sngags rnams 'dab ma la'o// phyi rol mu khyud dang por ni// rtsa ba'i sngag
218b4(rgyud): / god par bya// gnyis par 'od kyi rab bri// dri zhim dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste// rang nyid lha'i sbyor rdzogs bya// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od kyis ni// nam mkhar 'khor lo sbyangs byas te// yeyi ge hI g+hi rnam par bas
218b5(rgyud): / yongs gyur las sku tshogs bsgom// de dbus shes rab rnam par bsam// zla dbus steng du hUM la la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ldan bsgom par bya// der ni yi ge'i rnam pa ni// mar me lta bu gsal dmigs la// ma
218b6(rgyud): 'gro ma dang dbyed med bya// rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas nas// gser sogs dril nas pus sa ma mdul/ btags na 'jigs pa brgyad las skyog// thams cad du ni bsrung
218b7(rgyud): yungs kar ba yinam lda ga/ dung ba'i ske mar bcas pa'// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni// rgan mo meng med sbyor ba yi// gnas gsum thig le byas bsrung na// tshe ni stong phrag du mar 'phel// ku shab
219a1(rgyud): // mar yungs kar ti la// gsang sngags stong phrag bad+mas byas te// shes par gyur pa'o nyi ma la// mchod rten spyi bor gdags byas na// 'go ba'i nad rnams 'chad par 'gyur// khrag dang
219a2(rgyud): chung banas pa la// gsang sngags stong gragagasu ma 'azlas sde rnabaga'as gzung dus su /  bsnyen rdzogs par byas nas ni/ sa ni shin sas byas te/  tshogs gnod pa ga dmigs pa la/ 
219a3(rgyud): / sngags ni bsnun byas na// gang dmigs bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ ral bal gser por gyur pa la// shes rab mtshan ldan khrus byas te// shes pa nyi ma la bkal nas// bcings pa'i grangs kyis mdud byas te
219a4(rgyud): phrag gcig gis sngags bzlas nas/ lus sam mgul lam spyi bor gdags// depa ni tshel stong phrag thug/ yang na rang lus rnams bsgribs nas/ chu mi tshogs kyis dag byas te// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs ldan pa
219a5(rgyud): gzungs kyi phreng ba brjod byas na// gsar phyag lag tu ma blangs she// bden bral phyi rol ma song bar// gzhan gyis 'jigs pa ma bsngal zhing // tshe lo brgya ni rtswa brgyad par// rims nad tsam yang mi gnod
219a6(rgyud): / kos dang zas dang snod spyad dang // san la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mi 'khrug rgyal po rdo phyag rgyayi// bsrungs na cis kyang mi shod de// seng chen rngam pa'i skabs kyis ni// 'ug pa'i sgra gsum brjod pas na// phyi
219a7(rgyud): rig sngags stong phrag ni// du mas cis kyang mi tshugs so// klu'i dbang po gnas lugs kyis// rtse gcig rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcas// de nas gsang sngags gsum brjod de// nad dang gdon la sogs pa sel/ 
219a8(rgyud): pa'i mtsham byas nas// hUM gis mnan pa'i sngags kyis ni// dmigs med ting 'dzin yid brtan zhing // 'dis kyang gnod pa las bsrung 'gyur// phyi rol sogs pas kun spangs nas// snang ba yid
219b1(rgyud): bsu byas te/ mi 'a la 'dzin dmags nas// bsrung ba rnams kyi dpa pa bsha sa/ na gzhan pa 'asbyor babashad// dur khrid la sogs 'jigs gnas sam// mcho dang men 'dang dkon gnas dug/ 
219b2(rgyud): mas tshal chen dang / me tog tshal lam yul 'khor ldongs// chu yi 'gram 'am shing gcig gam// yang na rang gri khyi ma nyid du// maN+Dal legs par byugs pa la// brten nas lha la sbyor bsgrag/ ra sa la sogs
219b3(rgyud): mdun byas te// bde ba'i sman la skyil krung gis// bsdad nas mnyam bzhag brtsam par bya//  ma la sbyangs pa'i lus kyis ni/ thar pa chen po thob gyur te// gzhan du de ltar ma yin no// se gzhi shin du
219b4(rgyud): dka' zhig legs par bkod pa'i ri bo la// gnas tshul shin du sdug pa la// bsil ba'i chu rkun 'babs pa'i phyogs// rnam bkod me tog tshal gser tu// shar du sgo bstan khang pa la// sngags bzhi mtsham
219b5(rgyud): cing mchog yis// gsal khung dang bcas brtsigs pa'i phyogs// snyan pa'i bya yis sgra sgrogs shing / trigs spos dang ldan pa la// dril bu si la sil sgra sman spogs/ wA ldi gos kyi phreng bas dIkras// lhag pa'i 'du'i
219b6(rgyud): dam sbas nas// spyod pa 'thun pa'i grogs dang mi// bde bar byang chub sgrub par bya// 'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs// rnam 'byor yid 'jug phyir brtsam ste// che 'dag klangs pa'i phyi rol na// lhag pa'i bya
219b7(rgyud): chub ma mchis so// de dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams// rang gi sems las 'byung mod ce// sems tog/ ma lus spangs pa las// ngas ni chos gzhan 'ga' ma bshad// de bas sems trog sna tshogs rnams// 
219b8(rgyud): bar bya phyid tshogs pa// thugs dang phyag sa ting 'dzin dang / sbyong ba skye men rnams bshad do/ na mo ba sgrub pa'i thabs lag ni/ rig pa'i khro mos mnyan par gyis// lag zhi 'dud ce khris bya/ 
220a1(rgyud): / ma yi dkyil 'khor mngon bcas// dung zod labus // de ni bra mthod pa la// phyi rol dmar na ga can gyis byuH/ nang du sna tshogs rdo dzi ni/ wa kA gsas ldan zabar bya/ da
220a2(rgyud): rdorje mkha' 'gro mi'i// snying po sngags bcas dri bar bya// rdo rje ldan thams cad la//  wi mu klud gnyis phreng sngags// gsum par khro bo'i sngags zi'o// zod pa kha sbyor nang du na// ske cha yungs kar bcan du ga
220a3(rgyud): na na khrag dang sha chen dang // rkang rjes sa la sogs pa blugs// gcer bu rnal 'byor sleb / bA nas// lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas na// zhabs kyis thod pa 'a khor lo ni/ mnan te sngags phreng brjod par bya// 
220a4(rgyud): chen po'i sbyor ba yi// maka mA bzhag nas ni stong phrag tu// bzlas pa mtshan phyed par byas na// bsad pa nyid la the tshom med// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// dbus su me yi dkyil 'khor can/ rtsi bas brgyad ma kha
220a5(rgyud): gsum ldan pa// dbus su snying po sngags rnams la// hUM gnyis par du bsgrub bya'i ming // bsad pa nyid dang ldan par bya// mu khyud gnyis pa phreng sngags kyang // ming dang bsad par ldan pa'o// gsum 'gro ba'i rdza
220a6(rgyud): sa te// 'khor lo mchod cing byin brlabs nas// dgra gzugs sor brgyad snying gar gzhug/ de nyid til mar gyis byugs te// thod pa gnyis kyi 'khor lo yi/ bar du bcug nas me steng gzhag/ seng lde phur
220a7(rgyud): sor brgyad pa// mnyam bzhag sbyor bas sngags te gdang// bsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// shi bar 'gyur la gzhan du min// yang na byang chub yan lag las// dur khrod khrag gis 'khor lo bri// khrug
220a8(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i gzugs bris te// dbus su dgra ming gsang sngags bcas// rtsi bsal bcu gnyis bar du ni// ming dang bsad pa bcas pa bri// mu khyud dang po'i sngags phreng yang // rgyas pa'i yan lag ldan pa
220b1(rgyud): la ga gas ma brgyad pa'i// snying ga bcug nas skams dag nal 'byor pa 'i nyal pa'i zhab sa// mag ma stor ba ston bzhag par bya// chu shes ma mthong bar du ni// nyi shur gcig sngags brjodam
220b2(rgyud): doji dar gyis brgyan// sdang byed pa steng 'dir mi gnas// klu yi gnas su grags pa'am// chu li rdzi ngas la sogs 'gram du// dkyil 'khor ba yinam ldam byugs// pad ma dmar po'i ri mo la// lte ba dong ma
220b3(rgyud): 'grom// gser gyi mdog can thal mo sbyad// klu yi gdengs ka bdun ldan pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gnas pa// shin du bltas pas gnas par bya/ ga' bo nyer dga' 'jog po dang // mtha' yas dung skyong rigs
220b4(rgyud): gzugs// pad ma pad chen rnams byas te// dkar dang ser dang ldang ba dang / dmar dang ldang skya sngos dang / dmar ser ljang ser 'dzum pa'i gzugs// gtsol thal mo sbyar btud nas// rmyar phreng ba dang ldan gnas/ 
220b5(rgyud): 'bral can pa la sho ga/ sul ka tsa ti la sogs smram 'aldang batshogs su dang macas pa// rin chen snod du dajam par bya/ gapa'adang chu nang rnams dag nag/ kurnams pa de ba'i sems thong shog/ lha rnams yid da
220b6(rgyud): bkag nas// snying rje'i blo chen skye bar shog/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri ba sogs// byang chub sems chen dang ldan nas// thugs rje nye bar dgongs nas kyang // dus su char chen 'beb par shog/ smon lam de yi rjes su ni// 
220b7(rgyud): kye phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod pa'i de ma thag tu ni// char gyi spun yang 'bab par 'gyur// gal te cung zad mi 'bebs na// me la bsdigs pa tsam gyis ni// glog gi phreng ba gtor byed na// char chen 'bebs la
220b8(rgyud): chom mad/ ma mi thag gis srog/ 2// gong ga'akhor lo bslad pa'i// thabs dang ldan par bri byas nas/ du mod sa las byas pa'i// nga mo'i snying gar bcug nas kyang // kang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ 
221a1(rgyud): // bltas bka' yi sbyor ba yi// gsang sngags khri phrag gcig brjod da// bskrad pa nyid la the tsom med// sbrul dang sre mo'i khrag gis ni// d+ha dang ma he'i lcags pa la// mnyam du gnyis kyi gzugs
221a2(rgyud): te/ dbye ba'i sngags dang bcos pa'i/ 'khor lo ba pa'i gzugs bres la/ khags pa gnyis kyis kyi byi gyi blags kyi za ga kyil 'jo /  myo rjo sa sag da lda / gas
221a3(rgyud): dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor la// snying po dbang gi sbyor bar bcas// nub tu bltas nas bsrubs pa yi// lha yi dbang po dbang du 'gyur//  kyi khyad par sbyor pa'o// dri yi rgyal po sna tshogs kyi// shing gi lo ma dag
221a4(rgyud): so// do rnga rgya bram gnyis brtsegs kyi// phyogs kyi dra rnams hU~Mgs smras// mtshan gyi rnams dbus mal// hUM byi na yi yan lagal// phaT ni phye la bltas pa bri/ rgya chen gsol ba gdab par bya// gros
221a5(rgyud): zang dam ni skags shing du// cug nas rgyal mtshan rtser btags na/ rlung dang pod dang ser ba bcod// dman pa rnams dang 'brel ba slag// thal ba chu dang yungs kar dang // sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas byas te// srin la
221a6(rgyud): sogs pa 'khrugs pa'i ma// gtor ba tsam gyis 'chad par 'gyur/ 'brum yungs kar ser po la// sngags nas lus la byugs tsam gyis// bran tshogs nad rnams thams cad las// ma he shin du brtan
221a7(rgyud): bar byed/ 'phags mardo rje luT rgyud kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum po'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyin sreg thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad myur byed de// sna tshogs lha mos
221a8(rgyud): mnyan par byas// ser sna spangs shing g.yo rgyu med// dul la dpa' 'artul bzod pa / mkhas shing rig pa brtson 'grus pabang // sdig pa 'chagakhas pas sbyin sreg partsam/ tha bi ni nyi shu por chad la/ 
221b1(rgyud): brkos pa khyer rdo rnga na// rje gsum du khrod mon gyis bre/ phyi rol phyag rgya rnam bkod nas// dri zhim me tog bcal du dkyam// deri na mchod cing bsreg pa 'angs// tshogs nas rdzas rnams pasang gtor bya// 
221b2(rgyud): po'i ril ma dang / gsal shing cher bcas shing la me// sa bon las skyes sra bar bya// de ni da rtsi lu gu rlung // bskyed pa 'chog rdzogs byas nas// mchod cing bskyod nas der rjes su// ske tse yungs kar btsan drug
221b3(rgyud): dus phye sha chen til nag go/ dang bcas sbyin sreg stong phrag gcig/ phreng ba'i sngags kyis sbyor ba bya// thog ma tha mar mar chen dang // til mar brgya phrag re re sbyin// sbyor bcas sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang // ga bdun gyi
221b4(rgyud): bsgyub byed // shi bar 'gyu la le tshom med// glang sha sbal sha zi yang du// sbyin sreg/ stong gal bsgrub bya zhing/ 'bru ldong chos ru rba dag / ling ga grang ba mar shor bcas/ seng por byas la stong phrag ni// gcig
221b5(rgyud): 'phral du rengs par byed// sbrul rta ne'u le ma he'i sha/ bya rog 'ug sha stong phrag gcig / bsregs pas bsgrub bya 'bye bar nges// khra bo 'bras bur sha khrag/ stong phrag gicig gis lkugs par 'gyur// rnga mo bya
221b6(rgyud): na po'i sha/ sA lu dmar ti yi dkar po dang // yungs kar ser po la sogs pa// stong du bsreg pas skrod par byed// 'bru lnga smad 'tshong rang byung gis// nal phyed nub tu kha bltas dbyug/ me tog pad+ma dang
221b7(rgyud): pa'i// kha dog dmar dang ldan pa yi// 'od zer dmar ldan stong phrag gis// nges par 'gugs dang dbang du 'gyur// til bcas mar gyi sbyin sreg ni// stong phrag byas na sdig pa 'byang // ma dang dur bcan dang
221b8(rgyud): bcas// sbyin sreg stong gis tshe 'phel 'gyur// khu sha byang chub shing 'bras bu// yungs kar dkar po lan tshwa 'o// stong bsregs 'go ba'i nad rnam 'chad// yungs kar sha chen phye ma dang / dung khrod thal
222a1(rgyud): // dug sna tshogs// bro du phye ma'i sbyin sreg stong // zos pas byas na lha tshogs 'jigs// ut+pal dmar dang yang na dkar// gur kum bzang po'i sbyin sreg ni// skyod rtsa brgyad tsam bsreg bya
222a2(rgyud): bas/ rigs ldan bu mo dbang du 'gyur// a ru dang yungs kar dang / kha yi 'om skyong bsregs na// rnam thos rgyal po'i gter tsam gyis// longs spyod chen po 'thob par byed// oM rak+Sha rak+Shi ku ru Sha/ 
222a3(rgyud): ba'i sngags so// oM shAn+ti su ru a~M/ thams cad du zhi ba'i sngags so// hA bA shaM ku ru \u0f7f/ mtha' dag dbang du bya ba'o// s+thA puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA// thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngags so// phaT hAmA pa
222a4(rgyud): ra ya hUM phaT/ gsod pa'i sngags so// baM bi de sha ya ba/ dbye bar byed pa'i sngags so// u u tsa Ta ya u/ bskrad par byed pa'i sngags so// la staM ba ya/ staM ba ya li/ rengs par byed pa'i sngags so// r-i dz+wa ra
222a5(rgyud): rims bskyed pa'i sngags so//  A kaR+Sha ya thi dza/ dgug pa'i sngags so// oM bar sha ba ta ya pa ta ya oM/ char pa 'bab pa'i sngags so// li shaM laM b+hi ste b+ha ya laM/ ser ba bcad pa'i sngags so// 
222a6(rgyud): te dze/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// snre la ya ny+dza/ mam+ba tam+b+ha ts+tshin+da/ ts+tshama?/ ba ni d+ha ba ni d+ha/ ban d+ha ban pA/ zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so// dag pa'i rgyal po bla med
222a7(rgyud): sang chen 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// gas chen rgyud 'did mtshar te/ rmad byung bas rgyas rbad du gyu// stan pa'i snying pogs bachen 'di// gsung ba'i de ma thag tu ni// phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang la
222a8(rgyud): ngomatshar bskyed nas thal mo sbyar// bde ba'i snying po shin tu legs// legs so legs so rje 'dzin// gang la bde bskyed dpal thob byed// bdag cag rnams la thugs rje yis// rgyud kyi snying po 'di la
222b1(rgyud): pa/ che legs sa mar// 'phags pa rdo lu gu rgun gyi rtog pa las sbyin sreg gas le'u ste phan pa'o// 'phags mdong su gu nad \u0f7fto// gsu can nas 'byung ba rdzogs so// paN+Di ta at+pa la drAs
222b2(rgyud): lagus dang // bod kyi lo tsab ma ba chos kyi dbang phyugs grags pas bsrung ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsun dwe de ShI nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bad skad du/ 'phags pakra mo skal byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzung sa/ dkon
222b3(rgyud): cho ga gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed
222b4(rgyud): ma mthu skyobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi tham

254b1(rgyud): de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha don du byed pa da

260a2(rgyud): bong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu slo ba dang ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas sa
260a3(rgyud): zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// 
260a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba cing ba ni song so bcu'i
260a5(rgyud): mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar la/ de nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o// dkyil 'khor grub ni pa byas te me tog sna tshogs bkram la/

260b2(rgyud): po'i sems kyi spyan dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la gzungs bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'i 'bas 'dis ni wa'i dbang po 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'grol

318b2(rgyud): rus pa bdun cu rtsa bdu gdab par bya zhing / de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur sde mo ring bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi s+thi

324b1(rgyud): sang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu
324b2(rgyud): rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad 'asal nas de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsel
324b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten
324b4(rgyud): na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no// ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon che bar gnas par 'gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba che
324b5(rgyud): ba lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsag par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bshad kyang mi
324b6(rgyud): te bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las tshigs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyi na bsod nams kyi
324b7(rgyud): bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// dge slong dang / dge
324b8(rgyud): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob ring yon tan thob par 'dod pa gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar
325a1(rgyud): ba bzhin du byed te/ dgu bcurtsadagul ger bres la sangs rdzas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lcibs byugs te/ 
325a2(rgyud): bzhir dri'i chu bor bu bkang ba re re gzhag/ bdun spos kyi sdod dub 'phrul ba yang bzhag nas snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras skam po rnams thugs / 
325a3(rgyud): kyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag pa dang / yang ti la nag po dang / sran ma ma sha dang / 'bras rnams pa sres te bcom pa'i 'bras zug kris zhes bya ba dang / bas dkar gsum dang / 
325a4(rgyud): 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang / yang shing tog sna tshogs 'brum bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'a
325a5(rgyud): kyi steng du bkram la/ gsung grags kyi yi ge mamod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi thogs bzhir phrogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs
325a6(rgyud): phyag byas la sems rtse gcig bas gsang sngags 'di dgra gdon par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ oM bi bu la bi ma le/ pra ba re dzi na pa re/ sa ra sa ra/ pa rba ta thA ga ta d+hA du gar b+he/ a d+hiSh+Ti ti sA tra/ 
325a7(rgyud): sa ya ta ho ba Ni swA hA/ sarba pa Ni/ ba ha ya 'i bud d+hA a d+hi/ rAHsa ma ye swA hA/ bdug spos 'bul ba spyan mi 'chad par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa bkyang bton da byang chub sems
325a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu
325b1(rgyud): rnams nga' ma mchud can dul mchod pa dang / rim gro bya nga sreg shing brten par byed do// debam gong bu lang mar ma rgyas bya ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kang gA'i klung gi byem
325b2(rgyud): nas der gshegs te/ mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob ci rang bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do// de ltar sems thag pa nas sa tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang / 
325b3(rgyud): gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas po'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum las mchod rten byas pa dang
325b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rdzab rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / bgeg sa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan la lazhig mchod rten 'dri
325b5(rgyud): mthong ngam/ mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na yang las kyi sgrub pa dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus
325b6(rgyud): 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o// gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur/ 
325b7(rgyud): riredags la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang cho 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/ bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis
325b8(rgyud): na pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas blugs la de'i steng du spos kyi brgyad rdul gyis bugs te/ dkyil
326a1(rgyud): 'khar gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re gzhag la/ rdzar bstun pa reg yang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa ga cag kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag
326a2(rgyud): ges mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams cig kyang de re de'i nang du gzhug go// de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/ mchod rte
326a3(rgyud): 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug la/ mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag te/ me tog dang / byugs pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang
326a4(rgyud): gdon par bya'o// na maHna pa na pA tsi nA~M/ ta thA ga ta ga~M gAr+b+ha nAM/ DI bA lu k+Sha~M/ kr-i ni Na yu ta shatA satwA sA nA~M/ oM bo ba ra/ tsa raM Ni tsar/ mo rA kro ra tsa bA ra swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar
326a5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang mi zad de/ des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa
326a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tu stong phrog dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus / 
326a7(rgyud): cho rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bo brang dang / yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dge snyed ces ma
326a8(rgyud): cidag bigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang / yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do// yang ga pal zhi
326b1(rgyud): gsang ba sngags kyi rgyal ba 'di snying po man par yi ga dbris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa 'ams byas la lus la thogs na dgas pa de nyid kyis bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa mdzad de/ bas kyi
326b2(rgyud): 'ad klu thams cad dang / shAr ga nyer brnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer
326b3(rgyud): / gang la la zhig gis reg pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yalang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra
326b4(rgyud): khams thog gam/ klum la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i cha rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis ma tshug
326b5(rgyud): mes mi tshugs/ chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras
326b6(rgyud): tsho bar mdzad do// lha thams cad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la stongs grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur
326b7(rgyud): / de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger drilas lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshur
326b8(rgyud): gnas su mchod rten byas la/ de'i nang du bcug na 'gro ba thams cad dang / bya dang / spang ma dang / than grog spur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la phog pa'i sa
327a1(rgyud): / u ga d+hA dang / thabams pagan yang kyil sa dang / seM ga sa pa/ don sems lag par ltung bamams can dmyal bar bya bar 'gyur ba'i theg pa bams cad dang bral zhing / 
327a2(rgyud): ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur zhing phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can
327a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 
327a4(rgyud): tshangs pa ma mjed kyi bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di
327a5(rgyud): khye rnams la yongs su gtad kyis rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su bzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du chug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du yang rgyun ma bcad par sems
327a6(rgyud): la ston cig mthong zhing thos par byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sleb pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dag gsang
327a7(rgyud): baba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / 
327a8(rgyud): po la sogs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par smras te/ sol pa lo ma ldan 'as bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cagal thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags/ 
327b1(rgyud): de tshig dang / mchod rten pa rgya ba'i chog skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bkri// rtag par gzungs su gzungs ni mi bsrung
327b2(rgyud): gyi/ yi ge dbrib dang / bklag pa dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zos shing bong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gre sems
327b3(rgyud): myal ba la sogs pa dang / sdig pa thams cad las thabar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin spyi bos blangs pa'i slad du kasang sngag
327b4(rgyud): ka'adi dag ri ma gror bgyi/ bdun par brtsi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes bzhag par bgyi/ rgya cher 'phel bar brtsi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar lta bar bkye/ nam du yang ma
327b5(rgyud): 'gyung zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phrul pa/ skyes budam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas bsags pa
327b6(rgyud): chog 'di dag bsrung ba dang / rim grer bya ba dang / yangs su gzungs par khas blangs pa ni legs so legs so// shin du yang legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
327b7(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
327b8(rgyud): kyi mkhan pa pad+ya ka ras ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa pa ban+de dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// jo bo a ti sha dang dge ba shes 'bro ma ston pas sngags rnams dag par bas
328a1(rgyud): / rgyag rgad du/ sarba pradz+nyA d+d+ha pA mi ta sa d+han tu na ma du T+Ti/ bod skad du/ shes pas thams cad mthar byin par grub pa'i mchod rted zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la byas
328a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'du
328a3(rgyud): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la// phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dgel// mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med// 
328a4(rgyud): ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ rigs gsum la ba phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rira' chen po sna lnga las grub pa
328a5(rgyud): gzhi zhid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten pazhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rnga mo'i dbyings
328a6(rgyud): mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpapa dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / 
328a7(rgyud): po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang / thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la sogs pa rnams
328a8(rgyud): 'od zer bdo// rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig pa kyi stong drung du skyed cig pa kyi ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing mi lang ba bams
328b1(rgyud): 'ad zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad khong ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang

328b3(rgyud): / yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten chos kyi skus gang ni nga rgyas par byas te/ 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'ad
328b4(rgyud): bu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to// de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla bra dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phand
328b5(rgyud): gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / dril bu dang / dar dbyangs dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng bu dang / brag pa dang / mar me dang / bshos dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bco
328b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo'i ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad
328b7(rgyud): sol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i chog rig pa chen mo'i ma la uSh+NI degazung sa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gang la la zhig gis
328b8(rgyud): dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyin par byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu dang/ sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// 
329a1(rgyud): // la uSh+NISha'i reg pa chen mo mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di sa/ oM sde ya trA sarbata thA ga tA tre ya gar+the/ dral d+harma d+hA d+ha gar+b+he/ sa ta ra Na A lusl-i sho d+ha ya~M/ bA ba~Ms
329a2(rgyud): tAs man+ta uSh+NI Shabi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gyur to// rig pa chen mo 'di grog 'am/ ras sam
329a3(rgyud): shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba dang / rig pa chen mo 'di lus sa
329a4(rgyud): / mgul du thogs na/ de lha dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam/ dgon pa 'am/ sa phyogs gang
329a5(rgyud): 'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// oM s+t+rai yad+d+he sarba tA nA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dra la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA
329a6(rgyud): / thA ga tA sa man+ta ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shud+d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+bA ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ bi bi sa ra a a laM swA hA/ zhes brjod na/ sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ 
329a7(rgyud): dadu'am/ chu bo'am/ mtsho'am/ rgya mtshol sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// oMg+na li
329a8(rgyud): thA ga tA hr-id ya ga r+b+he/ dz+wa la d+ha ma d+hA du gar+b+he/ saM ha ra na A yu ma shod+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+te/ bes la uSh+NI 'bi shud+d+ha/ ma hA ber dzi ragam+b+hi ri si d+ha ma d+hA d+ha bi 'i sa ra a ma ma ki swA twe/ 
329b1(rgyud): 'dodan/ chuthams cad kyang mtshad rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang napa gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na/ nam mkha' thams cad kyang ma'o/ 
329b2(rgyud): na kyi nga bzhin du 'gyur ro// oM s+ye la ng+ge sarba ta thAg tA rbad lag r+b+he/ dz+wa la rnam dru gan+d+he/ saM ha ra NA A yu saM sho d+hA la/ pA paM sarba ta nA ga tA sa man+ta/ bi ma la uSh+NI bi shu/ ma hA bIr dze rag m+b+hir
329b3(rgyud): mang+ga du be'i sa a a e la~M ya~M swA tAM/ zhes 'dzin/ nam mkha' khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su / 
329b4(rgyud): ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang / slob pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yangs dang / shang dang / rnga dang / 
329b5(rgyud): rim pa dang / 'bi 'be gang yang rung ba'i sngags 'dis btab ste/ mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ oM rat+na ni t+ye bany+tsa le baM ba~M sa ra swA d+ha/ zhes 'arjod na
329b6(rgyud): lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab ni/ gang nigags ri dang / dngul dang / be DUraru la sogs pa rin
329b7(rgyud): bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis brlab
329b8(rgyud): 'jugs pa'i byer ro// rig pa chen sa 'das byin gyis brlabs te btabar/ 'brung ba chen po gang la mchod rten pa ta ba kyang bsgral pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i drim dag nas/ skyes pa dag/ 
330a1(rgyud): // rigs shing sAl chen po lta bur skyes nas phyer me ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ do dang / sheng le ba la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ 
330a2(rgyud): de gdon me za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu'i mgyis bgrod de/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis thob par 'gyur ro// reg pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs / se
330a3(rgyud): dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sdug

335a8(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gang rgyas byung de dag ni/ 
335b1(rgyud): rgyu las 'gog pa gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te// de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che// tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// sems can rnams la pan byed pa// las kun grub
335b2(rgyud): par byed pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs// rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni// dang por bcom ldan sangs rgyas la// gus shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas// bcom
335b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rten 'brel zab mo'i cho ga bshad// thams cad las dang 'thun par gsungs// dang por 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs / 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod/

348a5(rgyud): rerab ta na d+ha me/ oM pradz+nye shwa ti skr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/ d+hi d+hA ra NI swA hA oM pradz+nyA pa~M ram+bI ba la ye swA hA/ 'di bzung bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phyag brgya ba bzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bar+m+ma
348a6(rgyud): brjod byas na yid gzhung par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byeng bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
348a7(rgyud): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM pradz+nyA pradz+nye/ pradz+nyA a ba b+hA se/ pradz+nyA ba la ga ti sarba d+harma ar d+ha ka ra b+he d+harmA/ 
348a8(rgyud): sede t+te saH/ sisbyin du maM b+ha ga banyis rba dz+nyA na san d+hi re/ b+ha ga pa ti'ang tshel/ pra sa rarti ta snyamam sug gsi da d+hi/ bud d+ha budaH/ kaM ba ke ba/ pA la bA wen ThA ra d+ha / ba rab pag gar+dz+dza/ 
348b1(rgyud): bye ba la du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu la po'i gzus rdzogs so// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma tham shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phya
348b2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ oMd+h+we/ shrI ti smai ti'i dza sa swA hA/ phrad par mi tA ye/ sarba sa ti shod+b+hag rA d+hA swA hA// 'ad gzungs pas sa ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// wAs
348b3(rgyud): ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog go// las kyi sgrib pa dang nganas thams cad rnam par nyung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzung sa rdzogs so// pha rol tu phyin
348b4(rgyud): badrug gi snying po'i gzungs/ 'phags pa yum shes ba kyi rol sbyin pa la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'cha'o// cho la phyag para'o// dge dun la phyag 'tshal la/ na mo d+ham kA na saM b+hog kA ya/ ni mA Na kA
348b5(rgyud): tad+hak+Sha/ dAn pA ra mai/ shrIs pA Sh+Ta/ dz+nyAn ti pAr mek+Sha/ b+hi d+ya shA m-ing+ge/ d+hAn pAr mek+Sha/ prang+ga bA ra mit+ma/ sa r+b+baHma shAn+ta d+hA swA hA/ 'ad bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ro/ 
348b6(rgyud): pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lta byang bar 'gyur ro// bltas ngan pa thams cad kyang mi sdig
348b7(rgyud): so// pha rol du phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cing chos 'am sbyin 'thob par 'ga'o// oM na ma hUM b+hag pa

349b8(rgyud): d+harme/ sem dA par btan d+ha ma swAH/ e pra h+ye chu ti sh+ma ti'i ngog/ d+hid+ha rje yes hA/ 'di gzung bas nes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyab gzung bar 'gyur ro//
